Name: waymar royce
Speaker: Waymar Royce
Interaction: What do you expect? They're savages. One lot steals a goat from another lot and before you know it, they're ripping each other to pieces.

Name: will
Speaker: Will
Interaction: I've never seen wildlings do a thing like this. I've never seen a thing like this, not ever in my life.

Name: waymar royce
Speaker: Waymar Royce
Interaction: How close did you get?

Name: will
Speaker: Will
Interaction: Close as any man would.

Name: gared
Speaker: Gared
Interaction: We should head back to the wall.

Name: royce
Speaker: Royce
Interaction: Do the dead frighten you?

Name: gared
Speaker: Gared
Interaction: Our orders were to track the wildlings. We tracked them. They won't trouble us no more.

Name: royce
Speaker: Royce
Interaction: You don't think he'll ask us how they died? Get back on your horse.

Name: will
Speaker: Will
Interaction: Whatever did it to them could do it to us. They even killed the children.

Name: royce
Speaker: Royce
Interaction: It's a good thing we're not children. You want to run away south, run away. Of course, they will behead you as a deserter … If I don't catch you first. Get back on your horse. I won't say it again.

Name: royce
Speaker: Royce
Interaction: Your dead men seem to have moved camp.

Name: will
Speaker: Will
Interaction: They were here.

Name: gared
Speaker: Gared
Interaction: See where they went.

Name: royce
Speaker: Royce
Interaction: What is it?

Name: gared
Speaker: Gared
Interaction: It's …

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Go on. Father's watching.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: And your mother.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Fine work, as always. Well done.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Thank you.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: I love the detail that you've managed to get in this corners. … Quite beautiful … the stitching …

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Don't think too much, Bran.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Relax your bow arm.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Quick, Bran!

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: faster!

Name: Captain
Speaker: Captain
Interaction: Lord Stark. My lady. A guardsman just rode in from the hills. They've captured a deserter from the Night's Watch.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Get the lads to saddle their horses.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Do you have to?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He swore an oath, Cat.

Name: Captain
Speaker: Captain
Interaction: The law is law, my lady.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Tell Bran he's coming, too.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He won't be a boy forever. And winter is coming.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Lad, go run back and get the rest.

Name: will
Speaker: Will
Interaction: White Walkers. I saw the White Walkers. White Walkers. The White Walkers, I saw them.

Name: will
Speaker: Will
Interaction: I know I broke my oath. And I know I'm a deserter. I should have gone back to the Wall and warned them. But I saw what I saw. I saw the White Walkers. People need to know. If you can get word to my family, tell them I'm no coward. Tell them I'm sorry.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: nods yes, and WILL is positioned on the tree limb that serves as a block.

Name: will
Speaker: Will
Interaction: Forgive me, lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Don't look away.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: King of the Andals and the First Men …

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Father will know if you do.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You did well.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You understand why I did it?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Jon said he was a deserter.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: But do you understand why I had to kill him?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Our way is the old way?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Is it true he saw the White Walkers?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: So he was lying?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: A madman sees what he sees.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: What is it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Mountain lion?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: There are no mountain lions in these woods.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: It's a freak.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: It's a direwolf.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Tough old beast.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Now there are five.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You want to hold it?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Where will they go? Their mother's dead.

Name: Captain
Speaker: Captain
Interaction: They don't belong down here.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Better a quick death. They won't last without their mother.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Right. Give it here.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: NO!

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Put away your blade.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I take orders from your father, not you.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Please, father!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'm sorry, Bran.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: What about you?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I'm not a Stark. Get on.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: What is it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: The runt of the litter. That one's yours, Snow.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: As your brother, I feel it's my duty to warn you

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We're Lannisters. Lannisters don't act like fools.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: What if Jon Arryn told someone?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: But who would he tell?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: My husband.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn't know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he's off fucking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You should be the Hand of the king.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: That's an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You have five northern children. You're not an outsider.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I wonder if the old gods agree.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: It's your gods with all the rules.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I am so sorry, my love.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Tell me.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your sister. The boy …

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He's coming this far North, there's only one thing he's after.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: You can always say no, Ned.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion's chamber. I'm told he reads all night.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: I'm told he drinks all night.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.

Name: luwin
Speaker: Luwin
Interaction: We've brought up eight barrels of ale from the cellar. Perhaps we'll find out.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: In any case, candles.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Why's your mother so dead-set on us getting pretty for the king?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: It's for the queen, I bet. I hear she's [sleek as a mink?]

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: I hear the prince is a right royal prick.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He's never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Gods, but they grow fast. [Seeing BRAN on the wall] Brandon!

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I saw the king! He's got hundreds of people!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: How many times have I told you

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: But he's coming right now! Down our road!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I want you to promise me

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I promise.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: D'you know what?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: What?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Where's Arya? Sansa, where's your sister?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Hey,, hey, hey, hey. What are you doing with that on? [Pulls off ARYA's helm]

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Move!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You've got fat.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Cat!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Nine years. Why haven't I seen you? Where the hell have you been?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Guarding the North for you, Your Grace. Winterfell is yours.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Where's the Imp?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Will you shut up?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Who have we here? You must be Robb. My, you're a pretty one. Your name is?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Arya.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Ooh. Show us your muscles. You'll be a soldier.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: That's Jaime Lannister. The queen's twin brother.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Would you please shut up.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: My queen.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: My queen.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Take me to your crypt. I want to pay my respects.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: We've been riding for a month, my love. Surely the dead can wait.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Ned.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Where is our brother? Go find the little beast.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Tell me about Jon Arryn.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: One minute he was fine, and then … Burned right through him, whatever it was. I loved that man.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: We both did.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: He never had to teach you much, but me … You remember me at 16? All I wanted to do was crack skulls and fuck girls. He showed me what was what.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Aye.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Don't look at me like that. Not his fault I didn't listen. I need you, Ned. Down at Kings Landing. Not up here, where you're no damn use to anybody. Lord Eddard Stark, I would name you the Hand of the king.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'm not worthy of the honor.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I'm not trying to honor you. I'm trying to get you to run my kingdom while I eat, drink, and whore my way to an early grave. Damn it, Ned, stand up. You helped me win the Iron Throne, now help me keep the damn thing. We were meant to rule together. If your sister had lived, we would have been bound by blood. Well, it's not too late. I have a son, you have a daughter. We'll join our Houses.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Mmh. It is true what they say about the Northern girls.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Did you hear the king's in Winterfell?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I did hear something about that.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: And the queen. And her twin brother. They say that he is the most handsome man in the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And the other brother?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: The queen has two brothers?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: There's the pretty one. And there's the clever one.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: I hear they call him the Imp.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I hear he hates that nickname.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Oh? I hear he's more than earned it. I hear he's a drunken little lecher into all manner of perversions.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Clever girl.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: We've been expecting you, Lord Tyrion.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Have you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: The gods gave me one blessing.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Don't get up.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: M'lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse, brother?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: You've much to teach me, no doubt. But our sister craves your attention.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: She has odd cravings, our sister.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don't leave me alone with these people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I'm sorry, I've begun the feast a bit early. And this is the first of many courses.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I thought you might say that. But since we're short on time, Come on, girls. See you at sundown.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Close the door!

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Did you have to bury her in a place like this? She should be on a hill somewhere with the sun and the clouds above her.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: She was my sister. This is where she belongs.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: She belonged with me.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: In my dreams, I kill him every night.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: It's done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Not all of them.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Daenerys!

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Daenerys! There's our bride to be! Look – a gift from Illyrio. Touch it. Come on. Feel the fabric. Mmmm. Isn't he a gracious host?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: We've been his guests for over a year and he's never asked us for anything.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Illyrio is no fool. He knows I won't forget my friends when I come into my throne. You still slouch. Let me see. You have a woman's body now. I need you to be perfect today. Can you do that for me? You don't want to wake the dragon, do you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: No.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began today.

Name: maid
Speaker: Maid
Interaction: It's too hot, my lady.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Where is he?

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: The Dothraki are not known for their punctuality.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: May I present my honored guests? Viserys of House Targaryen, the third of his name. The rightful King of the Andals and the First Men. And his sister, Daenerys, of the House Targaryen.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Do you see how long his hair is? When Dothraki are defeated in combat, they cut off their braid so the whole world can see their shame. Khal Drogo has never been defeated. He's a savage, of course, but he's one of the finest killers alive. And you will be his queen.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: Come forward, my dear.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Where's he going?

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: The ceremony is over.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: But he didn't say anything. Did he like her?

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: Trust me, Your Grace. If he didn't like her, we'd know.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: It won't be long now. Soon you will cross the Narrow Sea and take back your father's throne. The people drink secret toasts to your health. They cry out for their true king.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: When will they be married?

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: Soon. The Dothraki never stay still for long.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Is it true they lie with their horses?

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: I wouldn't ask Khal Drogo.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Do you take me for a fool?

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: I take you for a king. Kings lack the caution of common men. My apologies if I've given offense.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: I know how to play a man like Drogo. I give him a queen and he gives me an army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I don't want to be his queen. I want to go home.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: So do I. I want us both to go home. But they took it from us. So tell me, sweet sister, how do we go home?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I don't know.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: We go home with an army. With Khal Drogo's army. I would let his whole tribe fuck you, all 40,000 men and their horses too, if that's what it took.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I'm ugly?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He's so handsome.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: When would we be married? Soon or do we have to wait?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Hush now. Your father hasn't even said yes.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Why would he say no? He'd be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: He'd have to leave home. He'd have to leave me. And so would you.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: You left your home to come here. And I'd be queen someday. Please make father say yes.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Sansa…

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Please, please. It's the only thing I ever wanted.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Is he dead yet?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Uncle Benjen!

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: You got bigger. I rode all day. Didn't want to leave you alone with the Lannisters. Why aren't you at the feast?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a bastard in their midst.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Well, you're always welcome on the wall. No bastard was ever refused a seat there.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: So take me with you when you go back.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Jon…

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Father will let me if you ask him, I know he will.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: The Wall isn't going anywhere.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I'm ready to swear your oath.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: You don't understand what you'd be giving up. We have no families. None of us will ever father sons.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I don't care about that.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: You might, if you knew what it meant. … I'd better get inside. Rescue your father from his guests. We'll talk later.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Your uncle's in the Night's Watch.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: What're you doing back there?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Preparing for a night with your family. I've always wanted to see the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You're Tyrion Lannister. The queen's brother?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My greatest accomplishment. You – you're Ned Stark's bastard, aren't you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Did I offend you? Sorry. You are the bastard, though.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Lord Eddard Stark is my father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And Lady Stark is not your mother. Making you a bastard. Let me give you some advice, bastard. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor. Then it can never be used to hurt you.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: What the hell do you know about being a bastard?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: All dwarves are bastards in their fathers' eyes.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: You at a feast -- It's like a bear in a trap.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The boy I beheaded. Did you know him?

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Of course I did. Just a lad. But he was tough, Ned. A true Ranger.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He was talking madness. Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: The two he was with are still missing.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: A wildling ambush.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Maybe. Direwolves south of the wall. Talk of the Walkers. My brother might be the next Hand to the king. Winter is coming.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Winter is coming.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Uncle Benjen.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Robb boy. How are ye?

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: I'm good.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Is this your first time in the North, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Yes. Lovely country.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I'm sure it's very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Hello, little dove. But you are a beauty. How old are you?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Thirteen, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You're tall. Still growing?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I think so, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And have you bled yet?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And your dress. Did you make it?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Such talent. You must make something for me.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I hear we might share a grandchild someday.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I hear the same.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Your daughter will do well in the capital. Such a beauty shouldn't stay hidden up here forever.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your pardon.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I hear we might be neighbors soon. I hope it's true.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I'm sure we'll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I don't fight in tournaments.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: No? Getting a little old for it?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I don't fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don't want him to know what I can do.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Well said.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Arya!

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Time for bed.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'm a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat's nest they call a capital.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I won't let him take you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The king takes what he wants. That's why he's king.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I'll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.'

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: How did he get so fat?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: He only stops eating when it's time for a drink.

Name: a voice
Speaker: A Voice
Interaction: It's Maester Luwin, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Send him in.

Name: luwin
Speaker: Luwin
Interaction: Pardon, my lord, my lady. A rider in the night from your sister.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Stay.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: This was sent from the Eyrie. What's she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn't been back there since her wedding.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What news?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: She's fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: She's fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn't know what she's saying.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Lysa's head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter. Do you think she would risk her life, her son's life, if she wasn't certain her husband was murdered?

Name: luwin
Speaker: Luwin
Interaction: If this news is true, and the Lannisters conspire against the throne, who but you can protect the king?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: They murdered the last Hand. Now you want Ned to take the job.

Name: luwin
Speaker: Luwin
Interaction: The king rode for a month to ask Lord Stark's help. He's the only one he trusts. You swore the king an oath, my lord.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: He spent half his life fighting Robert's wars. He owes him nothing. Your father and brother rode south once on a king's demand.

Name: luwin
Speaker: Luwin
Interaction: A different time. Different king.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: When do I meet with the Khal? We need to begin planning the invasion.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: If Khal Drogo has promised you a crown, you shall have it.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: When?

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: When their omens favor war.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: I piss on Dothraki omens. I waited 17 years to get my throne back.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is considered a dull affair.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: A small gift for the new Khaleesi. Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Thank you, ser. Are you from my country?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island. I served your father for many years. Gods be good, I hope to always serve the rightful king.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: Dragons' eggs, Daenerys. From the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai. The ages have turned them to stone, but they will always be beautiful.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Thank you, Magister.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: She's beautiful. … Ser Jorah, I don't know how to say ‘thank you' in Dothraki.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: There is no word for ‘thank you' in Dothraki.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Make him happy.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: No.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Do you know the Common Tongue?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Is ‘no' the only word that you know?

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: Rough night, Imp?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: If I get through this without squirting from one end or the other, it will be a miracle.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: I didn't pick you for a hunter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: The greatest in the land. My spear never misses.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: It's not hunting if you pay for it.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Are you as good with a spear as you used to be?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: No, but I'm still better than you.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I know what I'm putting you through. Thank you for saying yes. I only ask you because I need you. You're a loyal friend. You hear me? A loyal friend. The last one I've got.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I hope I'll serve you well.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You will. And I'll make sure you don't look so fucking grim all the time. Come on, boys, let's go kill some boar!

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Come on, you.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Stop. STOP.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Are you completely mad?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: He saw us.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: It's all right. It's all right.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: He saw us!

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I heard you the first time. Quite the little climber, aren't you? How old are you, boy?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Ten

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Ten.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: The things I do for love.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: You need to drink, child... And eat.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Isn't there anything else?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The Dothraki have two things in abundance

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: Khaleesi!

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Your hands.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace. Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality. You'd be more comfortable there.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: I have no interest in hospitality or comfort. I'll stay with Drogo until he fulfils his end of the bargain and I have my crown.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: As you wish, your Grace.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Well, Mormont, as brutish as this life is, I suppose it is preferable to beheading. What did Ned Stark want you for? Buying from a slaver?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Selling to one... Some poachers I caught on my land.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Under my reign, you won't be punished for such nonsense. You can rest assured of that.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Better-looking bitches than you're used to, Uncle. My mother's been looking for you. We ride for King's Landing today.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: What good will my sympathies do them?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: None. But it is expected of you. Your absence has already been noted.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: The boy means nothing to me. And I can't stand the wailing of women.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: One word and I'll hit you again.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I'm telling mother!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Go! Tell her. But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: You can't...

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Do you understand?

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: The Prince will remember that, little lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I hope so. If he forgets, be a good dog and remind him. Time for breakfast...

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Bread. And two of those little fish. And a mug of dark beer to wash it down. And bacon, burnt black.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Little brother.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Beloved siblings.

Name: myrcella baratheon
Speaker: Myrcella Baratheon
Interaction: Is Bran going to die?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Apparently not.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: What do you mean?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: The Maester says the boy may live.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: It's no mercy, letting a child linger in such pain.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Only the gods know for certain. All the rest of us can do is pray. The charms of the north seem entirely lost on you.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I still can't believe you're going. It's ridiculous even for you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Where's your sense of wonder? The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of the Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And go celibate? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock. I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: The children don't need to hear your filth. Come.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Speaking for the grotesques, I'd have to disagree. Death is so final, whereas life... Life is full of possibilities. I hope the boy does wake. I'd be very interested to hear what he has to say.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: My dear brother, there are times you make me wonder whose side you're on.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My dear brother, you wound me. You know how much I love my family.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Please.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I would have dressed, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: This is your home. I'm your guest. Handsome one, isn't he? I lost my first boy, a little black-haired beauty. He was a fighter too... Tried to beat the fever that took him. Forgive me. It's the last thing you need to hear right now.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I never knew.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: It was years ago. Robert was crazed, beat his hands bloody on the wall, all the things men do to show you how much they care... The boy looked just like him. Such a little thing... A bird without feathers. They came to take his body away and Robert held me. I screamed and I battled, but he held me. That little bundle. They took him away and I never saw him again. Never have visited the crypt, never. I pray to the Mother every morning and night that she return your child to you.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I am grateful..

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Perhaps this time she'll listen.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: A sword for the wall?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I already have one.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Good man. Have you swung it yet?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Of course I have.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: At someone, I mean. It's a strange thing, the first time you cut a man. You realize we're nothing but sacks of meat and blood and some bone to keep it all standing. Let me thank you ahead of time for guarding us all from the perils beyond the Wall... Wildlings and White Walkers and whatnot. We're grateful to have good, strong men like you protecting us.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: We've guarded the Kingdoms for 8 000 years.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Is it "we" already? Have you taken your vows then?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Soon enough.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not, It's only for life.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Thank you, Nymeria. Septa Mordane says I have to do it again. "My things weren't properly folded", she says. Who cares how they're folded?! They're going to get all messed up anyway.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: It's good you've got help.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Watch. Nymeria, gloves.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Impressive.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Shut up. Nymeria, gloves!

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I have something for you. And it has to be packed very carefully.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: A present?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Close the door. This is no toy. Be careful you don't cut yourself.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: It's so skinny.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: So are you. I had the blacksmith make it for you special. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're quick enough.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I can be quick.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel? Do you like the balance?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I think so.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: First lesson

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I know which end to use.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I'm going to miss you... Careful... All the best swords have names, you know.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Sansa can keep her sewing needles. I've got a needle of my own.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I came to say goodbye to Bran.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: You've said it.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I wish I could be here when you wake up. I'm going north with Uncle Benjen. I'm taking the black. I know we always talked about seeing the Wall together, but you'll be able to come visit me at Castle Black when you're better. I'll know my way around by then. I'll be a sworn brother of the Night's Watch. We can go out walking beyond the Wall, if you're not afraid.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I want you to leave.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I have no choice.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You can. You must.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You Starks are hard to kill.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: My mother?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: She was very kind.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: It was always my color.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Farewell, Snow.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: And you, Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Is my mother alive? Does she know about me? Where I am, where I'm going? Does she care?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Gods, this is country! I've half a mind to leave them all behind and keep going.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I've half a mind to go with you.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: What do you say, just you and me on the Kingsroad, swords at our sides, a couple of tavern wenches to warm our beds tonight.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You should have asked me 20 years ago.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: There were wars to fight, women to marry... We never had the chance to be young.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I recall a few chances.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: There was that one... Oh, what was her name? That common girl of yours? Becca? With the great big tits you could bury your face in.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Bessie. She was one of yours.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Bessie! Thank the gods for Bessie and her tits. Yours was... Aleena? No. You told me once. Meryl? Your bastardo s mother?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Wylla.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: That's it. She must have been a rare wench to make Lord Eddard Stark forget his honor. You never told me what she looked like.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Nor will I.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: We were at war. None of us knew if we were gonna go back home again. You're too hard on yourself. You always have been. I swear if I weren't your King, you'd have hit me already.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Trust me, that's not the worst thing. There was a rider in the night.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it? Should we send her a wedding gift?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: A knife perhaps, a good sharp one, and a bold man to wield it.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: She's little more than a child.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Soon enough that child will spread her legs and start breeding.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Tell me we're not speaking of this.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Oh, it's unspeakable to you? What her father did to your family... That was unspeakable. What Rhaegar Targaryen did to your sister... the woman I loved. I'll kill every Targaryen I get my hands on.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: But you can't get your hands on this one, can you?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: This Khal Drogo, it's said he has 100,000 men in his horde.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: There are still those in the Seven Kingdoms who call me Usurper. If the Targaryen boy crosses with a Dothraki horde at his back, the scum will join him.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: There's a war coming, Ned. I don't know when, I don't know who we'll be fighting, but it's coming.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Sit. You'll be fed. Untie them.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Why do you read so much?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Look at me and tell me what you see.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Is this a trick?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Until your brother killed that King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Yes, until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree? But how? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you? What's your story, bastard?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: The Night's Watch protects the realm from...

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense... Everything's better with some wine in the belly.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: It's time we reviewed the accounts, my lady. You'll want to know how much this royal visit has cost us.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Talk to Poole about it.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Poole went south with Lord Stark, my lady. We need a new steward, and there are several other appointments that require our immediate attention...

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I don't care about appointments!

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Very good, my Lord. My Lady.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: When was the last time you left this room?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I have to take care of him.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop!

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.

Name: assassin
Speaker: Assassin
Interaction: You're not supposed to be here. No one is supposed to be here. It's a mercy. He's dead already.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: No!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Have you ever seen a dragon?

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Dragon gone, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Everywhere? Even in the east?

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: No dragon. Brave men kill them. It is known.

Name: jhiqui
Speaker: Jhiqui
Interaction: It is known.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: A trader from Garth told me that dragons come from the moon.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: The moon?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: He told me the moon was an egg, Khaleesi, that once there were two moons in the sky. But one wandered too close to the sun and it cracked from the heat. Out of it poured a thousand thousand dragons and they drank the sun's fire.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Moon is no egg. Moon is goddess... wife of sun. It is known.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Leave me with her. Why did the trader from Garth tell you these stories?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: Men like to talk when they're happy. Before your brother bought me for you, it was my job to make men happy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: How old were you?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: I was nine when my mother sold me to the pleasure house.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Nine?!

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: I did not touch a man for three years, Khaleesi. First you must learn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Can you teach me how to make the Khal happy?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: Yes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Will it take three years?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: No.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Welcome.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: The boy was always sure-footed before.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Someone tried to kill him twice. Why? Why murder an innocent child? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Saw what, my lady?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.

Name: rodrick cassel
Speaker: Rodrick Cassel
Interaction: Did you notice the dagger the killer used? It's too fine a weapon for such a man. The blade is Valyrian steel, the handle dragonbone. Someone gave it to him.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: They come into our home and try to murder my brother? If it's war they want...

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: What, is there going to be a battle in the Godswood? Too easily words of war become acts of war. We don't know the truth yet. Lord Stark must be told of this.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I don't trust a raven to carry these words.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: I'll ride to King's Landing.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Mother, you can't.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I must.

Name: rodrick cassel
Speaker: Rodrick Cassel
Interaction: I'll send Hal with a squad of guardsmen to escort you.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.

Name: rodrick cassel
Speaker: Rodrick Cassel
Interaction: Let me accompany you at least. The Kingsroad can be a dangerous place for a woman alone.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: What about Bran?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: No, Khaleesi. You must look in his eyes always. Love comes in at the eyes. It is said that Irogenia of Lys could finish a man with nothing but her eyes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Finish a man?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: Kings traveled across the world for a night with Irogenia. Magisters sold their palaces. Khals burned her enemies just to have her for a few hours. They say a thousand men proposed to her and she refused them all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Well, she sounds like an interesting woman. I don't think that Drogo will like it with me on top.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: You will make him like it, Khaleesi. Men want what they've never had. And the Dothraki take slaves like a hound takes a bitch. Are you a slave, Khaleesi? Then don't make love like a slave. Very good, Khaleesi. Out there he is the mighty Khal, but in this tent, he belongs to you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I don't think that this is the Dothraki way.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: If he wanted the Dothraki way, why did he marry you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: No. No. Tonight I would look upon your face.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Pardon me, Ser.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: Do I frighten you so much, girl? Or is it him there making you shake? He frightens me too. Look at that face.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me?

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: He hasn't been very talkative these last 20 years. Since the mad King had his tongue ripped out with hot pincers.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: He speaks damn well with his sword though. Ser Ilyn Payne, the King's justice. The royal executioner. What is it, sweet lady? Does the hound frighten you? Away with you, dog. You're scaring my lady. I don't like to see you upset. The sun is finally shining. Come walk with me.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: My princess can drink as much as she wants. Don't worry... You're safe with me.

Name: mycah
Speaker: Mycah
Interaction: I'll get you!

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Arya!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: What are you doing here? Go away.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Your sister? And who are you, boy?

Name: mycah
Speaker: Mycah
Interaction: Mycah, my Lord.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He the butcher's boy.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: He's my friend.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: A butcher's boy who wants to be a Knight, eh? Pick up your sword, butcher's boy. Let's see how good you are.

Name: mycah
Speaker: Mycah
Interaction: She asked me to, my Lord. She asked me to.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I'm your prince, not your lord, and I said pick up your sword.

Name: mycah
Speaker: Mycah
Interaction: It's not a sword, my prince. It's only a stick.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: And you're not a Knight. Only a butcher's boy. That was my lady's sister you were hitting, do you know that?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Stop it!

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Arya, stay out of this.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I won't hurt him... Much. Filthy little bitch!

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I'll gut you, you little cunt!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Nymeria!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Please don't.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Then go! Don't touch me.

Name: soldier
Speaker: Soldier
Interaction: The wolf's not here. Look down by the stream.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: You've got to go. They'll kill you for what you did to Joffrey. Go on... run. Go! Leave now!

Name: soldier
Speaker: Soldier
Interaction: It's a direwolf.

Name: soldier
Speaker: Soldier
Interaction: I'll check down here.

Name: soldier
Speaker: Soldier
Interaction: I think I heard a noise.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Go!

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: My lord! My lord! They found her. She's unharmed.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Where is she?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: She's been taken directly before the King.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Who took her?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: The Lannisters found her.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Right, get back.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: The Queen ordered them to bring her straight to him.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Back! Back to the inn. All back!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I'm sorry.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Are you hurt?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: No.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: It's all right. What is the meaning of this? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: How dare you speak to your King in that manner?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Quiet, woman. Sorry, Ned. I never meant to frighten the girl. But we need to get this business done quickly.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Your girl and that butcher's boy attacked my son. That animal of hers nearly tore his arm off.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: That's not true! She just... Bit him a little. He was hurting Mycah.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Joffrey told us what happened. You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: That's not what happened!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Yes it is! They all attacked me and she threw my sword in the river.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Liar!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Shut up!

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Enough! He tells me one thing, she tells me another. Seven hells! What am I to make of this? Where's your other daughter, Ned?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: In bed asleep.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Now, child... Tell me what happened. Tell it all and tell it true. It's a great crime to lie to a King.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Liar! Liar liar liar!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Stop it! That's enough of that.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Liar liar liar!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Stop! Arya!

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: What would you have me do, whip her through the streets? Damn it, children fight. It's over.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You let that little girl disarm you? See to it that your daughter is disciplined. I'll do the same with my son.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Gladly, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And what of the direwolf? What of the beast that savaged your son?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I'd forgot the damned wolf.

Name: soldier
Speaker: Soldier
Interaction: We found no trace of the direwolf, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: So be it.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: We have another wolf.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: As you will.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You can't mean it.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: A direwolf's no pet. Get her a dog. She'll be happier for it.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He doesn't mean Lady, does he? No no, not Lady! Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Lady wasn't there! You leave her alone!

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Is this your command... your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Where is the beast?

Name: soldier
Speaker: Soldier
Interaction: Chained up outside, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Is this some trick?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The butcher's boy... You rode him down?

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: He ran... Not very fast.

Name: kings landing guard
Speaker: Kings Landing Guard
Interaction: Welcome, Lord Stark. Grand Maester Pycelle has called a meeting of the Small Council. The honor of your presence is requested.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Get the girls settled in. I'll be back in time for supper. And, Jory, you go with them.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Yes, my Lord.

Name: kings landing guard
Speaker: Kings Landing Guard
Interaction: If you'd like to change into something more appropriate…

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Glad to see you're protecting the throne.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Very handsome armor. Not a scratch on it.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I know. People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You've chosen your opponents wisely then.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I have a knack for it. It must be strange for you coming into this room. I was standing right here when it happened. He was very brave, your brother. Your father too. They didn't deserve to die like that. Nobody deserves to die like that.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: But you just stood there and watched.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: 500 men just stood there and watched. All the great knights of the Seven Kingdoms. You think anyone said a word, lifted a finger? No, Lord Stark. 500 men and this room was silent as a crypt. Except for the screams, of course, and the Mad King laughing. And later... When I watched the Mad King die, I remembered him laughing as your father burned... It felt like justice.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Is that what you tell yourself at night? You're a servant of justice? That you were avenging my father when you shoved your sword in Aerys Targaryen's back?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You served him well, when serving was safe.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Lord Varys.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son. Renly! You're looking well.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: And you look tired from the road. I told them this meeting could wait another day, but...

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: But we have a Kingdom to look after. I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark. No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: She has, Lord Baelish. I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem from navel to collarbone.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: It wasn't the man that I chose, my Lord. It was Catelyn Tully. A woman worth fighting for, I'm sure you'll agree.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: I humbly beg your pardon, my Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Grand Maester.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: How many years has it been? You were a young man.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And you served another King.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: How forgetful of me. This belongs to you, now. Should we begin?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Without the King?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Winter may be coming, but I'm afraid the same cannot be said for my brother.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: We are the lords of small matters here.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: My brother instructs us to stage a tournament in honor of Lord Stark's appointment as Hand of the King.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Mmm, how much?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: 40,000 gold dragons to the champion, 20,000 to the runner-up, 20,000 to the winning archer.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Can the treasury bear such expense?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect. We already owe Lord Tywin 3 million gold. What's another 80,000?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I'm telling you the Crown is six million in debt.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: How could you let this happen?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: The Master of Coin finds the money. The King and the Hand spend it.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Lord Arryn gave wise and prudent advice, but I fear His Grace doesn't always listen.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Counting coppers," he calls it.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'll speak to him tomorrow. This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: There will be no plans until I speak to Robert. Forgive me, my Lords. I had a long ride.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Please, it's nearly healed.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: It's ugly.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: A King should have scars, you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything. It bit me and all I did was scream. And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: That's not true. You killed the beast. You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father. When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor. Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Do I have to marry her?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Yes. She's very beautiful and young. If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses. And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores. And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it. You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be. Do something nice for the Stark girl.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I don't want to.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: No, but you will. The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: We allow the northerners too much power. They consider themselves our equals.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: How would you handle them?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I'd double their taxes and command them to supply 10,000 men to the royal army.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: A royal army?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Why should every lord command his own men? It's primitive, no better than the hill tribes. We should have a standing army of men loyal to the Crown, trained by experienced soldiers... Instead of a mob of peasants who've never held pikes in their lives.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And if the northerners rebel?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I'd crush them. Seize Winterfell and install someone loyal to the realm as Warden of the North. Uncle Kevan, maybe.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And these 10,000 northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: For me. I'm their King.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: I'm not asking.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
