Interaction: The North cannot be held... not by an outsider. It's too big and too wild. When the winter comes, the Seven gods together couldn't save you and your royal army. A good King knows when to save his strength... And when to destroy his enemies.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: So you agree... The Starks are enemies?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Enough of that, young lady. Eat your food.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I'm practicing.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Practicing for what?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: The Prince.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Arya, stop!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: He's a liar and a coward and he killed my friend.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: The Hound killed your friend.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: The Hound does whatever the Prince tells him to do.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: You're an idiot.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: You're a liar. And if you told the truth, Mycah would be alive.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Enough!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What's happening here?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Arya would rather act like a beast than a lady.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Go to your room. We'll speak later. That's for you, love…

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys. Don't you like it?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I haven't played with dolls since I was eight. May I be excused?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: You've barely eaten a thing.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: It's all right. Go on.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: War was easier than daughters.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Go away!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Arya, open the door. May I come in? Whose sword is that?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Mine.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Give it to me. I know this maker's mark. This is Mikken's work. Where did you get this? This is no toy. Little ladies shouldn't play with swords.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I wasn't playing. And I don't want to be a lady.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Come here. Now what do you want with this?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: It's called Needle.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: A blade with a name. And who were you hoping to skewer with Needle? Your sister? Do you know the first thing about sword fighting?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Stick 'em with the pointy end.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: laughs] That's the essence of it.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I was trying to learn. I asked Mycah to practice with me. I asked him. It was my fault.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: No, sweet girl. You didn't kill the butcher's boy.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I hate them! I hate all of them. The Hound, the Queen and the King and Joffrey and Sansa.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Sansa was dragged before the King and Queen... And asked to call the Prince a liar.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: So was I! He is a liar.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Darling, listen to me. Sansa will be married to Joffrey someday. She cannot betray him. She must take his side even when he's wrong.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: But how you can let her marry someone like that?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Well… Look at me. You're a Stark of Winterfell. You know our words.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Winter is coming.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You were born in the long summer. You've never known anything else. But now winter is truly coming. And in the winter, we must protect ourselves, look after one another. Sansa is your sister.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I don't hate her. Not really.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I don't want to frighten you, but I won't lie to you either. We've come to a dangerous place. We cannot fight a war amongst ourselves. All right? Go on. It's yours.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I can keep it?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Try not to stab your sister with it. If you're going to own a sword, you'd better know how to use it.

Name: old nan
Speaker: Old Nan
Interaction: Don't listen to it. Crows are all liars. I know a story about a crow.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I hate your stories.

Name: old nan
Speaker: Old Nan
Interaction: I know a story about a boy who hated stories. I could tell you about Ser Duncan the Tall. Those were always your favorites.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Those weren't my favorites. My favorites were the scary ones.

Name: old nan
Speaker: Old Nan
Interaction: Oh, my sweet summer child. What do you know about fear? Fear is for the winter, when the snows fall a hundred feet deep. Fear is for the long night, when the sun hides for years and children are born and live and die all in darkness. That is the time for fear, my little Lord, when the White Walkers move through the woods. Thousands of years ago there came a night that lasted a generation. Kings froze to death in their castles, same as the shepherds in their huts. And women smothered their babies rather than see them starve, and wept and felt the tears freeze on their cheeks. So is this the sort of story that you like? In that darkness, the White Walkers came for the first time. They swept through cities and kingdoms, riding their dead horses, hunting with their packs of pale spiders big as hounds…

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: What are you telling him now?

Name: old nan
Speaker: Old Nan
Interaction: Only what the little Lord wants to hear.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Get your supper. I want some time with him. One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant named Macumber.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Maybe we do.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: How do you feel? You still don't remember anything? I've seen you climb a thousand times. In the wind, in the rain... A thousand times. You never fall.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I did though. It's true, isn't it... what Maester Luwin says about my legs? I'd rather be dead.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Don't ever say that.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I'd rather be dead.

Name: rodrick cassel
Speaker: Rodrick Cassel
Interaction: Fewer eyes back here, my Lady. But still too many.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital. And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.

Name: rodrick cassel
Speaker: Rodrick Cassel
Interaction: My Lady.

Name: guard
Speaker: Guard
Interaction: Welcome to King's Landing, Lady Stark. Would you mind following us?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I would. We've done nothing wrong.

Name: guard
Speaker: Guard
Interaction: We've been instructed to escort you into the city.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Instructed? I don't know who's providing your instructions, but...

Name: guard
Speaker: Guard
Interaction: Follow me, Lady Stark.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Cat! Go on. Go upstairs.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I meant no disrespect to you of all people.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what like you wanted? I'm truly sorry... about the locale.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: A dear friend told me.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Lord Varys.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: How did you know I was coming?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Do you know whose dagger this is?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I must admit I do not.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Well well, this is an historic day. Something you don't know that I do. There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms. It's mine.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Yours?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last nameday. I bet on Ser Jaime in the jousting, as any sane man would. When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him, I lost this dagger.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: To whom?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Tyrion Lannister. The Imp.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: If that were a real sword, you'd be dead. Lord Snow here grew up in a castle spitting down on the likes of you. Pyp. Do you think Ned Stark's bastard bleeds like the rest of us?

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: Next!

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: Lord Snow, it appears you're the least useless person here. Go clean yourselves up. There's only so much I can stomach in a day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: A charming man.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: I don't need him to be charming. I need him to turn this bunch of thieves and runaways into men of the Night's Watch.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And how's that going, Commander Mormont?

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Slowly. A raven came for Ned Stark's son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Good news or bad?

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Both.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Lord Stark. I meant to give you this earlier. So forgetful these days. A raven from Winterfell this morning.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Good news? Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: My wife is in Winterfell.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Is she?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I thought that she'd be safest in here. One of several such establishments I own.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You're a funny man. A very funny man.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Ned! [poking her head out of a window]

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: The Starks... Quick tempers, slow minds.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: You broke my nose, bastard!

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: It's an improvement.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: If we threw you over the Wall, wonder how long it'd take you to hit.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: I wonder if they'd find you before the wolves did.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: What're you looking at, halfman?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I'm looking at you. You've got an interesting face. Very distinctive faces. All of you.

Name: rast
Speaker: Rast
Interaction: What do you care about our faces?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: It's just I think they would look marvelous decorating spikes in King's Landing. Perhaps I'll write my sister, the Queen, about it.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: We'll talk later, Lord Snow.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me. No one but you. My father knew and left me to rot here at the Wall all the same.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Grenn's father left him too... Outside a farmhouse when he was three. Pyp was caught stealing a wheel of cheese. His little sister hadn't eaten in three days. He was given a choice

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: They hate me because I'm better than they are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a master-at-arms like your Ser Rodrik. I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here. Your brother Bran. He's woken up.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: The mere suggestion that the Queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: We have proof. We have the blade.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him. The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake. A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I won't forget this. You're a true friend.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation to maintain.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: How could you be so stupid?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Calm down.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: He's a child... 10 years old. What were you thinking?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Nothing. He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Then what are you raving about?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: What if it comes back to him? If he tells his father what he saw...

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And my husband?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I'll go to war with him if I have to. They can write a ballad about us

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Let me go.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Never.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I wish I could see the girls.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: It's too dangerous.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Just for a moment.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Until we know who our enemies are...

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Littlefinger's right. I can't do anything without proof.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And if you find the proof?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Then I bring it to Robert... And hope he's still the man I once knew. You watch yourself on the road, huh? That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He still loves you.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Does he?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Off with you.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: It's been a long time. But I still remember every face. You remember your first?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Of course, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Who was it?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: A Tyroshi. Never learned the name.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: How'd you do it?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Lance through the heart.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Quick one. Lucky for you. Mine was some Tarly boy at the Battle of Summerhall. My horse took an arrow so I was on foot, slogging through the mud. He came running at me, this dumb high-born lad, thinking he could end the rebellion with the single swing of his sword. I knocked him down with the hammer. Gods, I was strong then. Caved in his breastplate. Probably shattered every rib he had. Stood over him, hammer in the air. Right before I brought it down he shouted, "Wait! Wait!"... They never tell you how they all shit themselves. They don't put that part in the songs. Stupid boy. Now the Tarlys bend the knee like everyone else. He could have lingered on the edge of the battle with the smart boys and today his wife would be making him miserable, his sons would be ingrates, and he'd be waking three times in the night to piss into a bowl. Wine! Lancel. Gods, what a stupid name. Lancel Lannister. Who named you? Some halfwit with a stutter? What are you doing?

Name: lancel lannister
Speaker: Lancel Lannister
Interaction: It's empty, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: What do you mean it's empty?

Name: lancel lannister
Speaker: Lancel Lannister
Interaction: There's no more wine.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Is that what empty means?! So get more. Tell your cousin to get in here. Kingslayer! Get in here. Surrounded by Lannisters. Every time I close my eyes I see their blond hair and their smug, satisfied faces. It must wound your pride, huh? Standing out there like a glorified sentry. Jaime Lannister, son of the mighty Tywin... Forced to mind the door while your King eats and drinks and shits and fucks. So come on. We're telling war stories. Who was your first kill, not counting old men?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: One of the outlaws in the Brotherhood.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: I was there that day. You were only a squire, 16 years old.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte. Best move I ever saw.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: A good fighter, Toyne, but he lacked stamina.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Your outlaw... Any last words?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I cut his head off, so no.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: What about Aerys Targaryen? What did the Mad King say when you stabbed him in the back? I never asked. Did he call you a traitor? Did he plead for a reprieve?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that's all, your Grace...

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The Dothraki don't believe in money. Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: From whom?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Tell them all to stop.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: You want the entire horde to stop? For how long?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Until I command them otherwise.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: You're learning to talk like a Queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Not a Queen. A Khaleesi.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: You dare! You give commands to me? To me? You do not command the dragon. I am Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. I don't take orders from savages or their sluts. Do you hear me?

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Rakharo ask if you want him dead, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: No!

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Rakharo say you should take ear, to teach respect.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Please please, don't hurt him. Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Kill these Dothraki dogs! I am your King!

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Shall we return to the Khalasar, Khaleesi?

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: You walk. [to Viserys]

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: I wanted to be here when you saw it for the first time. I'm leaving this morning.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You're leaving?

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: I'm the First Ranger. My job is out there. There have been disturbing reports.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: What kind of reports?

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: The kind I don't want to believe.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: m ready. I won't let you down.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: You're not going. You're no ranger, Jon.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: But I'm better than every...

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Better than no one! Here... A man gets what he earns, when he earns it. We'll speak when I return.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: A bear's balls.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: You're joking?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: And his brains and his guts, his lungs and his heart all fried in his own fat. When you're a hundred miles north of the Wall and you ate your last meal a week ago, you leave nothing for the wolves.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And how do a bear's balls taste?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: A bit chewy. And what about you, my Lord? What's the strangest thing you've eaten?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Do Dornish girls count? So you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves and bringing them here as eager recruits?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: But it's not all of 'em's done bad things. Some of 'em's just poor lads looking for steady feed. Some of 'em's high-born lads looking for glory.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: They have a better chance finding feed than glory.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: The Night's Watch is a joke to you, is it? Is that what we are, Lannister? An army of jesters in black?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: You don't have enough men to be an army and aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: I hope we've provided you with some good stories to tell when you're back in King's Landing. But something to think about while you're drinking your wine down there, enjoying your brothels... Half the boys you've seen training will die north of the Wall. Might be a wilding's axe that gets them, might be sickness, might just be the cold. They die in pain. And they do it so plump little lords like you can enjoy their summer afternoons in peace and comfort.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Do you think I'm plump? Listen, Benjen... May I call you Benjen?

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Call me what you like.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I'm not sure what I've done to offend you. I have great admiration for the Night's Watch. I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: You know, my brother once told me that nothing someone says before the word "but" really counts.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: But... I don't believe that giants and ghouls and White Walkers are lurking beyond the Wall. I believe that the only difference between us and the wildlings is that when the Wall went up, our ancestors happened to live on the right side of it.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: You're right. The wildlings are no different from us. A little rougher maybe. But they're made of meat and bone. I know how to track them and I know how to kill them. It's not the wildlings giving me sleepless nights. You've never been north of the Wall, so don't tell me what's out there.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Are you going below? Keep well, keep warm.

Name: benjen stark
Speaker: Benjen Stark
Interaction: Enjoy the capital, brother.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: I always do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I think he's starting to like me. "Going below"?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Into the tunnel and out the other side. He'll be north of the Wall for a month or two.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: So you're heading down to King's Landing too.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Day after tomorrow. I get about half of my recruits from their dungeons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Let's share the road. I could use some decent company.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: I travel a bit on the grubby side, my Lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Not this time. We'll be staying at the finest castles and inns. No one turns away a Lannister.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Yes, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: What are you doing?

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: When was last time you bleed, Khaleesi? You change, Khaleesi. It's a blessing from the Great Stallion.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle. It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan. But a man in full plate... the arakh won't get through the steel. That's where the broadsword has the advantage. Designed for piercing plate.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Dothraki don't wear steel dresses.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Armor.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Armor. Armor make a man... Vroz?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Slow.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Slow.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: My father taught me how to fight. He taught me that speed defeats size.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: I've heard that your father was a famous warrior.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: He was bloodrider to Khal Bharbo. And your father, Jorah the Andal? He was a warrior also?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: He still is. A man of great honor. And I betrayed him.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: The Khaleesi wants to eat something different tonight. Kill some rabbits.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: There are no rabbits.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Find some ducks, she likes ducks.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Have you seen any ducks, woman? No rabbits, no ducks. Do you have eyes in your head? Do you?

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Dog then. I have seen many dogs.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: I don't think she wants to eat dog.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: The Khaleesi have baby inside her. It is true. She does not bleed for two moons. Her belly start to swell.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: A blessing from the Great Stallion.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: She does not want to eat horse.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper. I need to ride to Qohor.

Name: rhakaro
Speaker: Rhakaro
Interaction: We ride for Vaes Dothrak.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Don't worry. I'll catch you. The horde's easy to find.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Don't stand so still. It's harder to hit a moving target. Except for you. You move too much. I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: How many winters have you seen, Lord Tyrion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Eight... no, nine.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: All of them brief?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: This summer has lasted nine. But reports from the Citadel tell us the days grow shorter. The Starks are always right eventually

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: We've been capturing wildlings, more every month. They're fleeing south. The ones who flee... say they've seen the White Walkers.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: One of our own rangers swore he saw them kill his companions. He swore it right up to the moment Ned Stark chopped his head off.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: The Night's Watch is the only thing standing between the realm and what lies beyond. And it has become an army of undisciplined boys and tired old men. There are less than a thousand of us now. We can't man the other castles on the Wall. We can't properly patrol the wilderness. We've barely enough resources to keep our lads armed and fed.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Your sister sits by the side of the King. Tell her we need help.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: When winter does come, gods help us all if we're not ready.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: It's a boy.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: How do you know?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I know.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: It's either me or this cold. And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Will you stop at Winterfell on your way South?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I expect I will. Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him. Tell him I'd visit if I could.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Of course.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: He'll never walk again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple. Take care, Snow.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Farewell, My Lord.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: You are late, boy. Tomorrow you will be here at midday.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Who are you?

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Your dancing master, Syrio Forel.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Tomorrow you will catch it. Now pick it up. That is not the way, boy. This is not a great sword that is needing two hands to swing it.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: It's too heavy.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: It is heavy as it needs to be to make you strong. Just so. One hand is all that is needed. Now you are standing all wrong. Turn your body side-face. So. You are skinny. That is good. The target is smaller. Now the grip... Let me see. The grip must be delicate.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: What if I drop it?

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: The steel must be part of your arm. Can you drop part of your arm? No. Nine years Syrio Forel was first sword to the Sealord of Braavos. He knows these things. You must listen to me, boy.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I'm a girl.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Boy, girl... You are a sword, that is all. That is the grip. You are not holding a battle-axe. You are holding...

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: A needle.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Ahhh… Just so. Now we will begin the dance. Remember, child, this is not the dance of the Westeros we are learning... The knight's dance, hacking and hammering. This is the Bravo's dance... The water dance. It is swift and sudden. All men are made of water, do you know this? If you pierce them, the water leaks out and they die. Now you will try to strike me.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Up! Dead. Dead. Very dead. Come. Again, faster.

Name: old nan
Speaker: Old Nan
Interaction: The little Lordo s been dreaming again.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: We have visitors.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I don't want to see anyone.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Really? If I was cooped up all day with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad. Anyway, you don't have a choice. Robb's waiting.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I don't want to go.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Neither do I. But Robb's Lord of Winterfell, which means I do what he says and you do what I say. Hodor! Help Bran down the hall.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Then you might learn a lordo s courtesy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: So it's true. Hello Bran. Do you remember anything about what happened?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: He has no memory of that day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Curious.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Why are you here?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Would your charming companion be so kind as to kneel? My neck is beginning to hurt.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Kneel, Hodor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Do you like to ride, Bran?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Yes. Well, I mean I did like to.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: The boy has lost the use of his legs.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What of it? With the right horse and saddle, even a cripple can ride.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I'm not a cripple.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Then I'm not a dwarf. My father will rejoice to hear it. I have a gift for you. Give that to your saddler. He'll provide the rest. You must shape the horse to the rider. Start with a yearling and teach it to respond to the reins and to the boy's voice.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Will I really be able to ride?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: You will. On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Spare me your false courtesies, Lord Stark. There's a brothel outside your walls. There I'll find a bed and both of us can sleep easier.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Couldn't resist some northern ass? If you like redheads, ask for Ros.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Come to see me off, Greyjoy? Kind of you. Your master doesn't seem to like Lannisters.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: He's not my master.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: No, of course not. What happened here? Where is lady Stark? Why didn't she receive me?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: She wasn't feeling well.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: She's not in Winterfell, is she? Where did she go?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: My lady's whereabouts...

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My lady? Your loyalty to your captors is touching. Tell me, how do you think Balon Greyjoy would feel if he could see his only surviving son has turned lackey? I still remember seeing my father's fleet burn in Lannisport. I believe your uncles were responsible?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Must have been a pretty sight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Nothing prettier than watching sailors burn alive. Yes, a great victory for your people. Shame how it all turned out.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: We were outnumbered 10 to one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: A stupid rebellion then. I suppose your father realized that when your brothers died in battle. Now here you are, your enemy's squire.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Careful, Imp.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I've offended you. Forgive me, it's been a rough morning. Anyway, don't despair. I'm a constant disappointment to my own father and I've learned to live with it. Your next tumble with Ros is on me. I'll try not to wear her out.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Leg, shoulder, leg. Left foot forward. Good. Now pivot as you deliver the stroke. Put all your weight behind it.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: What in seven hells is that?

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: They'll need an eighth hell to fit him in.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: Tell them your name.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Samwell Tarly, of Horn Hill. I mean, I was of Horn Hill. I've come to take the black.

Name: rast
Speaker: Rast
Interaction: Come to take the black pudding.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: Well, you couldn't be any worse than you look. See what he can do.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I yield. Please, no more.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: On your feet. Pick up your sword. Hit him till he finds his feet. It seems they've run short of poachers and thieves down south. Now they send us squealing bloody pigs. Again, harder.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Enough! He yielded.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: Looks like the bastardo s in love. All right then, lord Snow, you wish to defend your lady love, let's make it an exercise. You two. Three of you ought to be sufficient to make lady piggy squeal. All you've got to do is get past the bastard.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Are you sure you want to do this?

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: No. Yield yield yield! I yield.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: We're done for today. Go clean the armory. That's all you're good for.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Well fought!

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Piss off.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Did he hurt you?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I've had worse.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: You can call me Sam... If you want. My mother calls me Sam.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: It's not going to get any easier, you know? You'll have to defend yourself.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Why didn't you get up and fight?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I wanted to. I just couldn't.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Why not?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I'm a coward. My father always says so.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: The Wall's no place for cowards.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: You're right. I'm sorry. I just... Wanted to thank you.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: A bloody coward. People saw us talking to him. Now they'll think we're cowards too.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: You're too stupid to be a coward.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: You're too stupid to be a...

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Quick now, before summer's over.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Come on here!

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Vaes Dothrak. The city of the horselords.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: A pile of mud. Mud and shit and twigs - best these savages can do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: These are my people now. You shouldn't call them savages.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: I'll call them what I like, because they're my people. This is my army. Khal Drogo is marching the wrong way with my army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: If my brother was given an army of Dothraki, could you conquer the Seven Kingdoms?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The Dothraki have never crossed the Narrow Sea. They fear any water their horses can't drink.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: But if they did?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle, but the men advising him are different.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: And you know these men?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: I fought beside them once, long ago. Now Ned Stark wants my head. He drove me from my land.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You sold slaves.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Aye.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Why?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: I had no money and an expensive wife.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: And where is she now?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: In another place, with another man.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: Your Grace?

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Yes, my dear?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: They call you the last dragon...

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: They do.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: You have dragon's blood in your veins?

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: It's entirely possible.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: What happened to the dragons? I was told that brave men killed them all.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: The brave men didn't kill dragons. The brave men rode them. Rode them from Valyria to build the greatest civilization this world has ever seen. The breath of the greatest dragon forged the Iron Throne, which the Usurper is keeping warm for me. The swords of the vanquished, a thousand of them... melted together like so many candles.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: I have always wanted to see a dragon. There is nothing in the world that I would rather see.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Really? Why dragons?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: They can fly. And wherever they are, just a few flaps of their wings and they're somewhere else... Far away. And they can kill. Anyone or anything that tries to hurt them gets burned away to nothing... melted... like so many candles. Seeing a dragon would make me very happy.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Well, after 15 years in a pleasure house, I imagine just seeing the sky makes you happy.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: I was not locked in. I have seen things.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: What have you seen?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: I've seen... A man from Asshai with a dagger of real dragonglass. I've seen a man who could change his face the way that other men change their clothes. And I've seen a pirate who wore his weight in gold and whose ship had sails of colored silk. So... Have you seen one?

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: A pirate ship?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: A dragon.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: No, the last one died many years before I was born. I'll tell you what I have seen

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: What happened to the skulls?

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: I don't know. The Usurper had them smashed to powder, I expect. Scattered to the wind.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: That's very sad.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Yes, it is. What did I buy you for? To make me sad?

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: No, your Grace. To teach your sister.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: To teach my sister how to be a better lover? You think I bought you to make Khal Drogo happy? You pretty little idiot. Go on then. Get on with it.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Someday your husband will sit there and you will sit by his side. And one day, before too long, you will present your son to the court. All the lords of Westeros will gather here to see the little prince...

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: What if I have a girl?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Gods be good, you'll have boys and girls and plenty of them.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: What if I only have girls?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: I wouldn't worry about that.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Jeyne Poole's mother had five children, all of them girls.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Yes, but it's highly unlikely.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: But what if?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: If you only had girls, I suppose the throne would pass to Prince Joffrey's little brother.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: And everyone would hate me.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Nobody could ever hate you.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Joffrey does.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Nonsense. Why would you say such a thing? That business with the wolves? I've told you a hundred times... A direwolf is not...

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Please shut up about it.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Do you remember your lessons? Who built the Iron Throne?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Aegon the Conqueror.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: And who built the Red Keep?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Maegor the Cruel.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: And how many years did it take to build...

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: My grandfather and uncle were murdered here, weren't they?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: They were killed on the orders of King Aerys, yes.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: The Mad King.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Commonly known as the Mad King.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Why were they killed?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: You should speak to your father about these matters.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I don't want to speak to my father, ever.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: You will find it in your heart to forgive your father.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No, I won't.

Name: janos slynt
Speaker: Janos Slynt
Interaction: It's the Hando s tournament that's causing all this trouble, my Lords.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The King's tournament. I assure you the Hand wants no part of it.

Name: janos slynt
Speaker: Janos Slynt
Interaction: Call it what you will, Lord Stark Ser, the city is packed with people and more flooding in every day. Last night we had a tavern riot, a brothel fire, three stabbings and a drunken horse race down the Street of Sisters.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Dreadful.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: If you can't keep the King's peace, perhaps the City Watch should be commanded by someone who can.

Name: janos slynt
Speaker: Janos Slynt
Interaction: I need more men.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I will?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace. I'll also give you 20 of my household guards till the crowds have left.

Name: janos slynt
Speaker: Janos Slynt
Interaction: Thank you, my Lord Hand Ser. They will be put to good use.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The sooner this is over, the better.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket. Now... If there's nothing else, my Lords?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: This heat. On days like this, I envy you northerners your summer snows. Until tomorrow my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Lord Arryn? His death was a great sadness to all of us. I took personal charge of his care, but I could not save him. His sickness struck him very hard and very fast. I saw him in my chambers just the night before he passed. Lord Jon often came to me for counsel.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Why?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: I have been Grand Maester for many years. Kings and Hands have come to me for advice since...

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What did Jon want the night before he died?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: He came inquiring after a book.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: A book? What book?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: I fear it would be of little interest to you, my Lord. A ponderous tome.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'd like to read it.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: The lineages and histories of the great houses of the Seven Kingdoms, with descriptions of many high lords and noble ladies and their children.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Harkon Umber, first of his name, born to lord Hother Umber and lady Amaryllis Umber in the 183rd year after Aegon's landing, at the last hearth. Blue of eye, brown of hair and fair complected, died in his 14th year of a wound sustained

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: As I said, my Lord, a ponderous read.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: He did not, my Lord. And I did not presume to ask.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Jon's death...

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Such a tragedy.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Did he say anything to you during his final hours?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Nothing of import, my Lord. There was one phrase he kept repeating

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The seed is strong"? What does that mean?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: The dying mind is a demented mind, Lord Stark. For all the weight they're given, last words are usually as significant as first words.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: What else could it be?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Poison.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: A disturbing thought. I don't think it likely. The Hand was loved by all. What sort of man would dare...

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I've heard it said that poison is a woman's weapon.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Yes. Women, cravens... and eunuchs. Did you know that lord Varys is a eunuch?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Everybody knows that.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Yes, yes, of course. How that sort of person found himself on the King's Council, I will never know.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I've taken enough of your time.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: No trouble at all, my Lord. It's a great honor...

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Thank you. I'll find my own way out.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Syrio says a water dancer can stand on one toe for hours.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: It's a hard fall down these steps.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Syrio says every hurt is a lesson and every lesson makes you better. Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Cats? Syrio says…

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: He says every swordsman should study cats. They're quiet as shadows and as light as feathers. You have to be quick to catch them.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He's right about that.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Now that Bran's awake will he come live with us?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He needs to get his strength back first.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: He wants to be a knight of the King's Guard. He can't be one now, can he?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: No. But someday he could be Lord of a holdfast or sit on the King's Council. Or he might raise castles like Brandon the Builder.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Can I be Lord of a holdfast?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You will marry a high Lord and rule his castle. And your sons shall be knights and princes and lords.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: No. That's not me.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Hello. Ser Alliser said I'm to be your new watch partner. I should warn you, I don't see all that well.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Come stand by the fire. It's warmer.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: No, that's all right. I'm fine.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You're not. You're freezing.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I don't like high places.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You can't fight. You can't see. You're afraid of heights and almost everything else probably. What are you doing here, Sam?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: On the morning of my 18th nameday, my father came to me. "You're almost a man now," he said, "but you're not worthy of my land and title. Tomorrow, you're going to take the black, forsake all claim to your inheritance and start north. If you do not," he said, "then we'll have a hunt and somewhere in these woods your horse will stumble and you'll be thrown from your saddle to die. Or so I'll tell your mother. Nothing would please me more." Ser Alliser's going to make me fight again tomorrow, isn't he?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Yes, he is.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I'm not going to get any better, you know?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Well… You can't get any worse.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I hear you're reading a boring book.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Pycelle talks too much.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: He never stops. Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale? Not surprising. Until recently, he was only a squire... Jon Arryn's squire. He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Knighted for what? Why are you telling me this?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I promised Cat that I'd help you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Where is Ser Hugh? I'll speak to him.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: A singularly bad idea. Do you see that boy there? One of Varys's little birds. The Spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings. Now look there. That one belongs to the Queen. And do you see that Septa pretending to read her book?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Varys or the Queen?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: No. She's one of mine. Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Yes.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: The wiser answer was no, my Lord. Get a message to this paragon of yours... Discreetly. Send him to question Ser Hugh. After that, you might want him to visit a certain armorer in the city. He lives in a large house at the top of the street of Steel.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I have my observers, as I said, and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn visit this armorer several times in the weeks before his death.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Ser Hugh? Ser Hugh!

Name: hugh of vale
Speaker: Hugh Of Vale
Interaction: As you can see, I'm busy.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: I'm here on behalf of Lord Eddard Stark, the Hand of the king. I'm the captain of his guard.

Name: hugh of vale
Speaker: Hugh Of Vale
Interaction: I'm sorry. I didn't catch your name, Ser...

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: No "ser." I'm not a knight.

Name: hugh of vale
Speaker: Hugh Of Vale
Interaction: I see. Well, it just so happens that I am.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: He said he'd be glad to talk to the Hand himself. He's a knight, you see.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: A knight. They strut around like roosters down here. Even the ones who've never seen an arrow coming their way.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: You shouldn't be out here, my Lord. There's no telling who has eyes where.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Let them look.

Name: tobho mott
Speaker: Tobho Mott
Interaction: The former Hand did call on me, my Lord, several times. I regret to say he did not honor me with his patronage.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What did Lord Arryn want?

Name: tobho mott
Speaker: Tobho Mott
Interaction: He always came to see the boy.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'd like to see him as well.

Name: tobho mott
Speaker: Tobho Mott
Interaction: As you wish, my Lord. Gendry! Here he is. Strong for his age. He works hard. Show the Hand the helmet you made, lad.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: This is fine work.

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: It's not for sale.

Name: tobho mott
Speaker: Tobho Mott
Interaction: Boy, this is the King's Hand! If his lordship wants the helmet...

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: I made it for me.

Name: tobho mott
Speaker: Tobho Mott
Interaction: Forgive him, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: There's nothing to forgive. When Lord Arryn came to visit you, what would you talk about?

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: He just asked me questions is all, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What kind of questions?

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: About my work at first, if I was being treated well, if I liked it here. But then he started asking me about my mother.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your mother?

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: Who she was, what she looked like.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What did you tell him?

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: She died when I was little. She had yellow hair. She'd sing to me sometimes.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Look at me. Get back to work, lad. If the day ever comes when that boy'd rather wield a sword than forge one, you send him to me.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Find anything?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: King Robert's bastard son.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: This is for the King from Lord Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Listen. Do you hear them? How many do you think are in there with him? Guess.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Three? Four?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: He likes to do this when I'm on duty... He makes me listen as he insults my sister.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Forgive me, my Lord...

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Why do I have to forgive you? Have you wronged me?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: We've met before, you know.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Have we? Strange, I've forgotten.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: The siege of Pyke. We fought side by side one afternoon.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: That's where you got your scar?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Aye. One of the Greyjoys nearly took my eye.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Vicious sons of whores.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: They like their bloodshed.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: They stopped liking it at the end. That was a proper battle. D'you remember Thoros of Myr charging through the breach?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: With his burning sword? I'll remember that till the day I die.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I saw the youngest of the Greyjoy lads at Winterfell. It was like seeing a shark on a mountaintop.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Theon? He's a good lad.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I doubt it.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I'll bet you smell of blackberry jam! Let me smell it. Come here.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Can I leave this with you? The message from Lord Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I don't serve Lord Stark.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Where have you been?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Watch duty. With Sam.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Prince Porkchop. Where is he?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: He wasn't hungry.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Impossible!

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: That's enough. Sam's no different from the rest of us. There was no place for him in the world, so he's come here. We're not going to hurt him in the training yard anymore. Never again, no matter what Thorne says. He's our brother now and we're going to protect him.

Name: rast
Speaker: Rast
Interaction: You are in love, Lord Snow. You girls can do as you please. But if Thorne puts me up against Lady Piggy, I'm gonna slice me off a side of bacon.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: No one touches Sam.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: What are you waiting for? Attack him! You, get in there.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Hit me. Go on, hit me! I yield! Yield yield. I yield.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: You think this is funny, do you? When you're out there beyond the Wall with the sun going down, do you want a man at your back? Or a sniveling boy?

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: You send this whore to give me commands? I should have sent you back her head!

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: Forgive me, Khaleesi. I did as you asked.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Hush now. It's all right. Irri, take her and leave us.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Yes, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Why did you hit her?!

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: How many times do I have to tell you? You do not command me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I wasn't commanding you. I just wanted to invite you to supper.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: What's this?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: It's a gift. I had it made for you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Dothraki rags? Are you going to dress me now?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Please.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: This stinks of manure. All of it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Stop - stop it.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: You would turn me into one of them, wouldn't you? Next you'll want to braid my hair.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You've no right to a braid. You've won no victories yet.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: You do not talk back to me!

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: You are a horselordo s slut. And now you've woken the dragon...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I am a Khaleesi of the Dothraki! I am the wife of the great Khal and I carry his son inside me. The next time you raise a hand to me will be the last time you have hands.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I know for a fact that some of the officers go to that brothel in Mole's Town.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I wouldn't doubt it.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Don't you think it's a little bit unfair? Making us take our vows while they sneak off for a little sally on the side?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Sally on the side?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: It's silly, isn't it? What, we can't defend the Wall unless we're celibate? It's absurd.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I didn't think you'd be so upset about it.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Why not? Because I'm fat? But I like girls just as much as you do. They might not like me as much. I've never... been with one. You've probably had hundreds.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: As a matter of fact, I'm the same as you.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I find that hard to believe.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I came very close once. I was alone in a room with a naked girl, but...

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: You didn't know where to put it?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I know where to put it.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Was she... Old and ugly?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Young and gorgeous. A whore named Ros.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: What color hair?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Red.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I like red hair. And her... Her...

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You don't want to know.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: That good?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Better.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Oh no. So why exactly did you not make love to Ros with the perfect...

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: What's my name?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Jon Snow?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: And why is my surname Snow?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Because... You're a bastard from the north.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I never met my mother. My father wouldn't even tell me her name. I don't know if she's living or dead. I don't know if she's a noblewoman or a fisherman's wife... Or a whore. So I sat there in the brothel as Ros took off her clothes. But I couldn't do it. Because all I could think was what if I got her pregnant and she had a child, another bastard named Snow? It's not a good life for a child.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: So... You didn't know where to put it?

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: Enjoying yourselves? You look cold, boys.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: It is a bit nippy.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: A bit nippy, yeah, by the fire, indoors. It's still summer. Do you boys even remember the last winter? How long has it been now? What, 10 years? I remember. Was it uncomfortable at Winterfell? Were there days when you just couldn't get warm, never mind how many fires your servants built?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I build my own fires.

Name: alliser thorne
Speaker: Alliser Thorne
Interaction: That's admirable. I spent six months out there, beyond the Wall during the last winter. It was supposed to be a two-week mission. We heard a rumor Mance Rayder was planning to attack Eastwatch. So we went out to look for some of his men... Capture them, gather some knowledge. The Wildlings who fight for Mance Rayder are hard men. Harder than you'll ever be. They know their country better than we do. They knew there was a storm coming in. So they hid in their caves and waited for it to pass. And we got caught in the open. Wind so strong it yanked 100-foot trees straight from the ground, roots and all. If you took your gloves off to find your cock to have a piss, you lost a finger to the frost. And all in darkness. You don't know cold. Neither of you do. The horses died first. We didn't have enough to feed them, to keep them warm. Eating the horses was easy. But later when we started to fall... That wasn't easy. We should have had a couple of boys like you along, shouldn't we? Soft, fat boys like you. We'd have lasted a fortnight on you and still had bones leftover for soup. Soon we'll have new recruits and you lot will be passed along to the Lord Commander for assignment and they will call you men of the Night's Watch, but you'd be fools to believe it. You're boys still. And come the winter you will die... Like flies.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I hit him. I hit the dragon.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Your brother Rhaegar was the last dragon. Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: He is still the true King.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The truth now

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: No. But the common people are waiting for him. Illyrio said they're sewing dragon banners and praying for his return.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends. They don't care what games the high Lords play.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: What do you pray for, Ser Jorah?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Home.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I pray for home too. My brother will never take back the Seven Kingdoms. He couldn't lead an army even if my husband gave him one. He'll never take us home.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Lover's quarrel?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I'm sorry. Do I...?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Sansa dear, this is Lord Baelish. He's known...

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: An old friend of the family. I've known your mother a long long time.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Why do they call you Littlefinger?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Arya!

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Don't be rude!

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: No, it's quite all right. When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I've been sitting here for days! Start the damn joust before I piss myself!

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Gods, who is that?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Ser Gregor Clegane. They call him the Mountain. The Houndo s older brother.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: And his opponent?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Ser Hugh of the Vale. He was Jon Arryn's squire. Look how far he's come.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Yes, yes. Enough of the bloody pomp. Have at it!

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Not what you were expecting? Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound? Lovely little tale of brotherly love. The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe. Gregor a few years older, already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation. Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence. One evening... Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire... Gregor's toy, a wooden knight. Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals. Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted. There aren't very many people who know that story.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I won't tell anyone. I promise.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
