Interaction: No, please don't. If the Hound so much as heard you mention it, I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: My Lord, Her Grace the Queen.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You're missing your tournament.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us – the ugliness with the wolves. And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme. Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned. How is Sansa?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: She likes it here.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: The only Stark who does. Favors her mother, not much of the north in her.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What are you doing here?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I might ask the same of you. What is it you hope to accomplish?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You can't change him. You can't help him. He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done. You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: If that's my job, then so be it.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You're just a soldier, aren't you? You take your orders and you carry on. I suppose it makes sense. Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I was also trained to kill my enemies, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: As was I.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Seven blessings to you, goodfolk!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: And to you.

Name: rodrick cassel
Speaker: Rodrick Cassel
Interaction: Boy! Bread, meat and beer, quickly.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Good idea, grandfather. I'm starving. A song while we wait or?

Name: rodrick cassel
Speaker: Rodrick Cassel
Interaction: I'd rather throw myself down a well.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Grandfather, may be your last chance if you're heading north. The only music the northerners know is the howling of wolves!

Name: masha heddle
Speaker: Masha Heddle
Interaction: I'm sorry, my Lord, we're full up. Every room.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My men can sleep in the stable. As for myself, I don't require a large room.

Name: masha heddle
Speaker: Masha Heddle
Interaction: Truly, my lord, we have nothing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Is there nothing I can do... to remedy this?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: You can have my room.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: There's a clever man. You can manage food, I trust? Yoren, dine with me.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Aye, my Lord.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: My Lord of Lannister! Might I entertain you while you eat? I can sing of your father's victory at King's Landing!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Nothing would more likely ruin my supper. Lady Stark! What an unexpected pleasure. I was sorry to have missed you at Winterfell.

Name: masha heddle
Speaker: Masha Heddle
Interaction: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I was still Catelyn Tully the last time I stayed here. You, Ser... Is that the black bat of Harrenhal I see embroidered on your coat?

Name: knight of house whent
Speaker: Knight Of House Whent
Interaction: It is, my Lady.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: And is Lady Whent a true and honest friend to my father... Lord Hoster Tully of Riverrun?

Name: knight of house whent
Speaker: Knight Of House Whent
Interaction: She is.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: The red stallion was always a welcome sight at Riverrun. My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.

Name: knight of house bracken
Speaker: Knight Of House Bracken
Interaction: Our lord is honored by his trust.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I envy your father all his fine friends, but I don't quite see the purpose of this.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Knight of House Frey

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Does Ser Hugh have any family in the capital?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: No. I stood vigil for him myself last night. He had no one else.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He'd never worn this armor before.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Bad luck for him... Going against the Mountain.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Who determines the draw?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: All the knights draw straws, Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Aye... But who holds the straws? You've done good work, Sisters.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Life is strange. Not so many years ago we fought as enemies at the Trident.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'm glad we never met on the field, Ser Barristan... as is my wife. I don't think the widow's life would suit her.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: You're too modest. I've seen you cut down a dozen great knights.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: My father once told me you were the best he'd ever seen. I never knew the man to be wrong about matters of combat.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: He was a fine man, your father. What the Mad King did to him was a terrible crime.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And that lad... He was a squire until a few months ago. How could he afford a new suit of armor?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Perhaps Lord Arryn left him some money? I hear the King wants to joust today.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Yes. That will never happen.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Robert tends to do what he wants.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: If the King got what he wanted all the time, we'd still be fighting a damned rebellion.

Name: lancel lannister
Speaker: Lancel Lannister
Interaction: It's made too small, Your Grace. It won't go.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Your mother was a dumb whore with a fat arse. Did you know that? Look at this idiot! One ball and no brains. He can't even put a man's armor on him properly.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You're too fat for your armor.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Fat? Fat, is it? Is that how you speak to your King? That was funny, is it?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Oh, it's funny, is it?

Name: lancel lannister
Speaker: Lancel Lannister
Interaction: No, Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: No? You don't like the Hando s joke?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You're torturing the poor boy.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You heard the Hand. The King's too fat for his armor! Go find the breastplate stretcher, now!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The breastplate stretcher?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: How long before he figures it out?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Maybe you should have one invented.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: All right, all right. But you watch me out there. I still know how to point a lance.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You have no business jousting. Leave that for the young men.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Why? Because I'm king? Piss on that. I want to hit somebody!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And who's going to hit you back?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Anybody who can. And the last man in his saddle... will be you!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: There's not a man in the Seven Kingdoms would risk hurting you.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Are you telling me those cowards would let me win?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Aye.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Drink.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'm not thirsty.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Drink. Your King commands it. Gods! Too fat for my armor.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your squire... A Lannister boy?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Hmm... A bloody idiot... But Cersei insisted. I have Jon Arryn to thank for her. "Cersei Lannister will make a good match", he told me. "You'll need her father on your side." I thought being King meant I could do whatever I wanted. Enough of this! Let's go watch 'em ride. At least I can smell someone else's blood.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Robert?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: What? Oh! An inspiring sight for the people, eh? Come! Bow before your King! Bow, you shits!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Where's Arya

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: At her dancing lessons. The Knight of the Flowers.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Thank you, Ser Loras.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Don't let Ser Gregor hurt him.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Hey.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I can't watch.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: 100 gold dragons on the Mountain.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: I'll take that bet.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Now what will I buy with 100 gold dragons? A dozen barrels of Dornish wine? Or a girl from the pleasure houses of Lys?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Or you could even buy a friend.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He's going to die.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Ser Loras rides well.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Such a shame, Littlefinger. It would have been so nice for you to have a friend.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: And tell me, Lord Renly, when will you be having your friend?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Loras knew his mare was in heat. Quite crafty, really.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Ser Loras would never do that! There's no honor in tricks.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: No honor but quite a bit of gold.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Stop this madness in the name of your King!

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: I owe you my life, Ser.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: I'm no Ser.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Remove his hood.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: On that eve, the captive Imp down-wards from his horse did limp, no more would he preen and primp, in garb of red and gold.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: This isn't the Kingsroad. You said we were riding for Winterfell.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I did... often and loudly.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Very wise. They'll be out in droves, looking for me in the wrong place. Wordo s probably gotten to my father by now. He'll be offering a handsome reward. Everyone knows a Lannister always pays his debts. Would you be so good as to untie me?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: And why would I do that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Why not? Am I going to run? The hill tribes would kill me for my boots. Unless a Shadowcat ate me first.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Shadowcats and hill tribes are the least of your concerns.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Ah... the Eastern Road. We're going to The Vale. You're taking me to your sister's to answer for my imagined crimes. Tell me, Lady Stark. When was the last time you saw your sister?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Five years ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: She's changed. She was always a bit touched, but now... you might as well kill me here.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: I am not a murderer, Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Neither am I! I had nothing to do with the attempt on your son's life!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: The dagger found

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What sort of imbecile arms an assassin with his own blade?

Name: rodrik cassel
Speaker: Rodrik Cassel
Interaction: Should I gag him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Why? Am I starting to make sense?

Name: rodrik cassel
Speaker: Rodrik Cassel
Interaction: My Lady, this way.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Untie me. If I die, what's the point?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Rodrik?

Name: rodrik cassel
Speaker: Rodrik Cassel
Interaction: I'll be fine, my Lady. There's no need to bloody yourself.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Your first? You need a woman. Nothing like a woman after a fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Well, I'm willing if she is.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Bran...

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: The Iron Islands. Sigil - a Kraken. Words - "We do not sow".

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Lords?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: The Greyjoys.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Famed for their skills at archery, navigation and lovemaking.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: And failed rebellions.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Sigil - a stag. - A crowned stag now that Robert's King.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Good.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Words - "Ours is the fury". Lords - the Baratheons.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: The Westerlands - sigil - a lion.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Hmm...

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Words - "A Lannister always pays his debts."

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: No. A common saying, but not their official motto.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Lords - the Lannisters.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: We're still on their words.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I don't know them.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: You do know them. Think.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Unbowed, unbent, unbroken".

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: That's House Martell.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Righteous in wrath".

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: House Hornwood.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Family, duty, honor".

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Those are Tully words... Your mother's. Are we playing a game?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Family, duty, honor"... Is that the right order?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: You know it is.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Family comes first?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Your mother had to leave Winterfell to protect the family.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: How can she protect the family, if she's not with her family?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Your mother sat by your bed for three weeks while you slept.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: And then she left!

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: When you were born, I was the one who pulled you from your mother. I placed you in her arms. From that moment until the moment she dies, she will love you. Absolutely. Fiercely.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Why did she leave?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: I still can't tell you, but she will be home soon.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Do you know where she is now? Today?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: No, I don't.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Then how can you promise me she'll be home soon?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Sometimes I worry you're too smart for your own good.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I'll never shoot another arrow.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: And where is that written?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: You need legs to work a bow.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Hmm... If the saddle Lord Tyrion designed actually works, you could learn to shoot a bow from horseback.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Really?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Dothraki boys learn when they're four years old. Why shouldn't you?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Shh... Keep it down. You're not supposed to be inside the castle walls.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: I thought you were supposed to be an important person around here.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Important enough for the likes of you.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: You're not the only nobleman in my life, you know.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Who? the Imp? I'd call him half a nobleman.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Jealous?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Why should I be jealous?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Anyone with a few coppers in his pocket can own you for the night. What's a dwarf like down below? I've always wondered.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Might surprise you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Hmm?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: He's good with his fingers too. And his tongue.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Generous tipper. I guess gold is cheap for a Lannister.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: You are jealous.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I'm a Greyjoy. We've been Lords of the Iron Islands for 300 years. There's not a family in Westeros that can look down on us, not even the Lannisters.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: And what about the Starks?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I've been Lord Stark's ward since I was eight years old.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: A “ward”, that's a nice word for it. Your father rebelled against King Robert and if he does it again…

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: My father fought for the freedom of his people! What did your father do? Fucked a cook and whelped a whore.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: You're a very serious boy.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I'm not a boy.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Oh, yes you are. A serious boy, with a serious cock.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I don't want to pay for it.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Then get yourself a wife.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Come on. I'm not gonna hurt you.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: How is your son, my Lord?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He'll never walk again.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: But his mind is sound?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: So they say.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I didn't trust you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: So why do you trust me now?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What sort of doom does the King face?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Who gave it to him?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The squire, Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Someone who could afford it.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: He started asking questions.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: And when he knows the truth, what will he do?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: What good is war now? We're not ready. If one Hand can die, why not a second?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: This Hand is not the other.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: We need time. Khal Drogo will not make his move until his son is born. You know how these savages are.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.

Name: illyrio
Speaker: Illyrio
Interaction: It never was.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: You do move quietly.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: We all have our qualities.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Am I? All those birds that whisper in your ear, such pretty little things. Trust me, we accommodate all inclinations.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: All desires are valid to a man with a full purse.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Strictly speaking.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Since you last saw me or since I last saw you?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Saw me with your own eyes?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Eyes I own.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Council business. We all have so much to discuss with Ned Stark.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: One shudders at the thought.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Oh.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Have you?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Was that you under the bed?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Oh, please.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: To find myself in a position where a simple word to the King --

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: What are you two conspiring about? Well, whatever it is, you'd best hurry up. My brother is coming.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: To a small council meeting?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?

Name: guard
Speaker: Guard
Interaction: Off with you. No begging.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I'm not a beggar. I live here.

Name: guard
Speaker: Guard
Interaction: D'you want a smack on your ear to help you with your hearing?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I want to see my father.

Name: guard
Speaker: Guard
Interaction: I want to fuck the Queen, for all the good it does me.

Name: guard
Speaker: Guard
Interaction: You want your father, boy? He's lying on the floor of some tavern, getting pissed on by his friends.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: My father is Hand of the King! I'm not a boy. I'm Arya Stark of Winterfell and if you lay a hand on me, my father will have both your heads on spikes! Now are you going to let me by or do I need to smack you on the ear to help with your hearing?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You know I had half my guard out searching for you? You promised me this would stop.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: They said they were going to kill you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Who did?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I didn't see them, but I think one was fat.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Oh, Arya.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I'm not lying! They said you found the bastard and the wolves are fighting the lions and the savage... something about the savage.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Where did you hear this?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: In the dungeons, near the dragon skulls.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What were you doing in the dungeons?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Chasing a cat.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Pardon, my Lord. There's a Night's Watchman here begging a word. He says it's urgent.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your name, friend?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Yoren, if it please. This must be your son. He has the look.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I'm a girl!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Did Benjen send you?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: No one sent me, my Lord. I'm here to find men for The Wall, see if there's any scum in the dungeons that might be fit for service.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Ah, we'll find recruits for you.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Thank you, my Lord. But that's not why I disturb you now. Your brother, Benjen... his blood runs black, makes him as much my brother as yours. It's for his sake I rode here so hard I damn near killed my horse! There are others riding too. The whole city will know by tomorrow.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Know what?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Best said in private, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Go on. We'll talk more later.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Jory, take her safely to her room.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Come along, my Lady. You heard your father.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: How many guards does my father have?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Here in King's Landing? Fifty.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: You wouldn't let anyone kill him, would you?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: No fear on that count, little Lady.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Well?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: It's about your wife, my Lord. She's taken the Imp.

Name: vardis egen
Speaker: Vardis Egen
Interaction: You're far from home, Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: To whom do I speak?

Name: vardis egen
Speaker: Vardis Egen
Interaction: Ser Vardis Egen, Knight of The Vale. Is Lady Arryn expecting your visit?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: There was no time to send word.

Name: vardis egen
Speaker: Vardis Egen
Interaction: May I ask, my Lady, why he is with you?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: That's why there was no time. He is my prisoner.

Name: vardis egen
Speaker: Vardis Egen
Interaction: He doesn't look like a prisoner.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: My sister will decide what he looks like.

Name: vardis egen
Speaker: Vardis Egen
Interaction: Yes, my Lady. She will at that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Give me 10 good men and some climbing spikes... I'll impregnate the bitch.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I like you.

Name: steward
Speaker: Steward
Interaction: Lord Stark, your presence has been requested in the small council chamber. A meeting has been called.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I need to see the King first -- alone.

Name: steward
Speaker: Steward
Interaction: The King is at the small council meeting, my Lord. He has summoned you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Is it about my wife?

Name: steward
Speaker: Steward
Interaction: No, my Lord. I believe it concerns Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: The whore is pregnant.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You're speaking of murdering a child.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I warned you this would happen. Back in the North, I warned you, but you didn't care to hear. Well, hear it now. I want 'em dead, mother and child both. And that fool, Viserys as well. Is that plain enough for you? I want them both dead.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Honor?! I've got Seven Kingdoms to rule! One King, Seven Kingdoms. Do you think honor keeps them in line? Do you think it's honor that's keeping the peace? It's fear! Fear and blood!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Then we're no better than the Mad King.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Careful, Ned. Careful now.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Based on whose information?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: And if he's right? If she has a son? A Targaryen at the head of a Dothraki army… What then?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Do nothing? That's your wise advice? Do nothing til our enemies are on our shores? You're my council? Counsel! Speak sense to this honorable fool.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: I bear this girl no ill will, but should the Dothraki invade, how many innocents will die? How many towns will burn? Is it not wiser, kinder even, that she should die now so that tens of thousands might live?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: We should have had them both killed years ago.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I followed you into war - twice, without doubts, without second thoughts. But I will not follow you now. The Robert I grew up with didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: She dies.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I will have no part in it.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You're the King's Hand, Lord Stark. You'll do as I command or I'll find me a Hand who will.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And good luck to him. I thought you were a better man.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Out! Out, damn you! I'm done with you. Go! Run back to Winterfell! I'll have your head on a spike! I'll put it there myself, you fool! You think you're too good for this? Too proud and honorable? This is a war!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'll go ahead with my daughters. Get them ready. Do it yourself. Don't ask anyone for help.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Right away, my Lord. Lord Baelish is here for you.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: His Grace went on about you at some length after you took your leave. The word "treason" was mentioned.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What can I do for you?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: When do you return to Winterfell?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Why? What do you care?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: If you're still here come nightfall, I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn spoke with before falling ill. If that sort of thing still interests you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I don't have the time.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Round up all the men we have and station them outside the girls' chambers. Who are your best two swords?

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Heward and Wyl.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Find them and meet me at the stables.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You bring him here without permission? You pollute my home with his presence? Your aunt has done a bad thing, Robin, a very bad thing. You remember her, don't you? Isn't he beautiful? And strong too. Jon knew it. His last words were, "the seed is strong." He wanted everyone to know what a good, strong boy his son would grow up to be. Look at him, the Lord of all the Vale.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Lysa, you wrote me about the Lannisters, warning me t-

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: To stay away from them! Not to bring one here!

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: Mommy? Is that the bad man?

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: It is.

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: He's little.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: He's Tyrion the Imp of House Lannister. He killed your father. He murdered the Hand of the King!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Oh? Did I kill him too? I've been a very busy man.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You will watch your tongue! These men are Knights of the Vale. Every one of the loved Jon Arryn. Every one of them would die for me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: If any harm comes to me, my brother, Jaime, will see that they do.

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: You can't hurt us! No one can hurt us here! Tell him, mommy! Tell him!

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Shh... Shh... Shh, my sweet boy. He's just trying to frighten us. Lannisters are all liars. No one will hurt my baby.

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: Mommy... I want to see the bad man fly.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Perhaps you will, my little love.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: This man is my prisoner. I will not have him harmed.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Ser Vardis, my sister's guest is weary. Take him down below so he can rest. Introduce him to Mord.

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: You go sleep, dwarf man. Sleep good, little dwarf. man!

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Lord Stark's lucky he still has a head.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Robert will rant for a few days, but he won't do anything. He adores the man.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: You're jealous.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Are you sure this won't hurt?

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Only if I slip.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: And you prefer me like this?

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Mhmm.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: If you want hairless, maybe you should find a little boy.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: I want you.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: My brother thinks that anyone who hasn't been to war isn't a man. He treats me as if I'm a spoiled child. Oh, and you're not? Loras Tyrell, the Knight of the Flowers? How many wars have you fought in? Oh, and how much did your father spend on that armor of yours?

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Hold still.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: All I ever hear from Robert and Stannis is how I'm not tough enough, how I squirm at the sight of blood.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: You did vomit when that boy's eye was knocked out in the mêlée.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: His eye was dangling out of the damn socket!

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: He shouldn't have entered the mêlée if he didn't know how to fight.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Easy for you to say. Not everyone is such a gifted swordsman.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: It's not a gift. No one gave it to me. I'm good because I work at it -- every day of my life since I could hold a stick.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: I could work at fighting all day, every day, and still never be as good as you.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Yes well, I guess we'll never know.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Everywhere?

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Everywhere. So how did it end up? The Targaryen girl will die?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: It needs to be done, unpleasant as it is. Robert's rather tasteless about it. Every time he talks about killing her, I swear the table rises six inches.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: It's a shame he can't muster the same enthusiasm for his wife.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: He does have a deep, abiding lust for her money. You have to give it to the Lannisters, they may be the most pompous, ponderous cunts the gods ever suffered to walk the world, but they do have outrageous amounts of money.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: I have an outrageous amount of money.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Not as much as the Lannisters.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: But a lot more than you.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Robert's threatening to take me hunting with him. Last time we were out there for two weeks, tramping through the trees in the rain, day after day. All so he can stick his spear into something's flesh! Oh. but Robert loves his killing. And he's the King.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Hmm... How did that ever happen?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Because he loves his killing and he used to be good at it.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Do you know who should be King?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Be serious.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: I am. My father could be your bank. I've never fought in a war before, but I'd fight for you.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: I'm fourth in line.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: And where was Robert in the line of royal succession? Joffrey is a monster. Tommen is eight.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Stannis?

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Stannis has the personality of a lobster.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: He's still my older brother.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: What are you doing?!

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: Look at it.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: You cut me!

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: It's just blood. We've all got it in us. Sometimes a little spills. If you become King, you're going to see a lot of this. You need to get used to it. Go on. Look. People love you. They love to serve you because you're kind to them. They want to be near you.

Name: loras tyrell
Speaker: Loras Tyrell
Interaction: You're willing to do what needs to be done, but you don't gloat over it. You don't love killing. Where is it written that power is the sole province of the worst? That thrones are only made for the hated and the feared. You would be a wonderful King.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I'm sorry your marriage to Ned Stark didn't work out. You seemed so good together.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I'm glad I could do something to make you happy.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Without a Hand, everything will fall to pieces.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I suppose this is where you tell me to give the job to your brother Jaime.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: No. He's not serious enough. I'll say this for Ned Stark - he's serious enough. Was it really worth it? Losing him this way?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I don't know. But I do know this, if the Targaryen girl convinces her horse-lord husband to invade and the Dothraki horde crosses The Narrow Sea... We won't be able to stop them.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: The Dothraki don't sail. Every child knows that. They don't have discipline. They don't have armor. They don't have siege weapons.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: It's a neat little trick you do, you move your lips and your father's voice comes out.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Is my father wrong?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Let's say Viserys Targaryen lands with forty thousand Dothraki screamers at his back. We hole up in our castles, a wise move. Only a fool would meet the Dothraki in an open field. They leave us in our castles. They go from town to town, looting and burning, killing every man who can't hide behind a stone wall, stealing all our crops and livestock, enslaving all our women and children. How long do the people of the Seven Kingdoms stand behind their absentee King, their cowardly King hiding behind high walls? When do the people decide that Viserys Targaryen is the rightful monarch after all.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: We still outnumber them.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Which is the bigger number -- five or one?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Five.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Five... one. One army, a real army, united behind one leader with one purpose. Our purpose died with the Mad King. Now we've got as many armies as there are men with gold in their purse. And everybody wants something different. Your father wants to own the world. Ned Stark wants to run away and bury his head in the snow.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: What do you want?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: We haven't had a real fight in nine years. Back-stabbing doesn't prepare you for a fight. And that's all the realm is now, back-stabbing and scheming and arse-licking and money-grubbing. Sometimes I don't know what holds it together.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Our marriage.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Ah, so here we sit, seventeen years later, holding it all together. Don't you get tired?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Every day.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: How long can hate hold a thing together?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Well, seventeen years is quite a long time.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Yes, it is.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Yes, it tis. What was she like?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You've never asked about her, not once. Why not?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: At first, just saying her name, even in private felt like I was breathing life back into her. I thought if I didn't talk about her, she'd just fade away for you. When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And eventually it became clear that my spite didn't mean anything to you, as far as I could tell, you actually enjoyed it.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: So why now?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: What harm could Lyanna Stark's ghost do to either of us that we haven't done to each other a hundred times over?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You want to know the horrible truth? I can't even remember what she looked like. I only know she was the one thing I ever wanted... Someone took her away from me, and Seven Kingdoms couldn't fill the hole she left behind.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I felt something for you once, you know?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I know.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Even after we lost our first boy -- for quite a while, actually. Was it ever possible for us? Was there ever a time, ever a... moment?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: No. Does that make you feel better or worse?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: It doesn't make me feel anything.

Name: mhaegen
Speaker: Mhaegen
Interaction: She looks like him, don't she, my Lord? She has his nose, his black hair.

Name: mhaegen
Speaker: Mhaegen
Interaction: Tell him when you see him, my Lord. If it please you... Tell him how beautiful she is.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I will.

Name: mhaegen
Speaker: Mhaegen
Interaction: And tell him I've been with no one else. I swear it, my Lord, by the old gods and new. I don't want no jewels or nothing, just him. The King was always good to me.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: When Jon Arryn came to visit you, what did he want?

Name: mhaegen
Speaker: Mhaegen
Interaction: He wasn't that sort of man, my Lord. He just wanted to know if the child was happy, healthy.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: She looks healthy enough to me. The girl shall want for nothing.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Brothels make a much better investment than ship, I've found. Whores rarely sink.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What do you know of King Robert's bastards?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Well, he has more than you, for a start.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: How many?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Does it matter? If you fuck enough women, some of them will give you presents.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And Jon Arryn tracked them all down. Why?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: He was the King's Hand. Perhaps Robert wanted them looked after. He was overcome with fatherly love.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Come.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Jory!

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Such a small pack of wolves.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: Stay back, Ser! This is the Hand of the King!

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: What's the meaning of this, Lannister?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Blond hair, sharp tongue, short man.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I remember him well.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: It seems he had some trouble on the road. You wouldn't know what happened to him, would you?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He was taken at my command to answer for his crimes.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: My Lords! I'll bring the City Watch!

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Come, Stark. I'd rather you die sword in hand.

Name: jory cassel
Speaker: Jory Cassel
Interaction: If you threaten my Lord again...

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Threaten? As in, "I'm going to open your Lord from balls to brains and see what Starks are made of”?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You kill me, your brother's a dead man.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: You're right. Take him alive! Kill his men!

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: My brother, Lord Stark... We want him back.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your pardon, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Do you know what your wife has done?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: She did nothing I did not command.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Who'd have thought she had it in her?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: By what right dare you lay hands on my blood?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I am the King's Hand -

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You were the King's Hand!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: trying to keep the peace -

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You shall now be held accountable.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Oh, will both of you shut your mouths? Catelyn will release Tyrion and you'll make your peace with Jaime.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: He butchered my men.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Lord Stark was returning drunk from a brothel when his men attacked Jaime.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Quiet, woman.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Jaime has fled the city. Give me leave to bring him back to justice.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I took you for a king.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Hold your tongue.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: He's attacked my brother and abducted the other. I should wear the armor and you the gown.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: I shall wear this like a badge of honor.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Wear it in silence or I'll honor you again.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: See what she does to me? My loving wife. I should not have hit her. That was not… That was not kingly.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: If we don't act… there will be a war.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: So tell your wife to return that little shit of an Imp to King's Landing. She's had her fun, now put an end to it. You hear me? Send a raven and put an end to it.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And what about Jaime Lannister? What about Jaime?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I'm half a kingdom in debt to his bloody father. I don't know what happened between you and those yellow-haired shits. I don't want to know. This is what matters - I can't rule the kingdoms if the Starks and the Lannisters are at each other's throats, so enough!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: As you command your Grace. With your leave, I will return to Winterfell and set matters straight.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Piss on that! Send a raven. I want you to stay. I'm the king, I get what I want… I never loved my brothers. A sad thing for a man to admit, but it's true. You were the brother I chose. We'll talk when I return from the hunt.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The hunt?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Killing things clears my head. You'll have to sit on the throne while I'm away. You'll hate it more than I do.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The Targaryen girl -

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Seven hells! Don't start with her again! The girl will die and I'll hear no more of it. Put on the badge. And if you ever take it off again, I swear to the Mother I'll pin the damn thing on Jaime Lannister.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Khaleesi?

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Oh, Khaleesi!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You're hurt.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Not too fast.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Come on, Dancer.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: When are you gonna tell him?

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Not now.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Blood for blood. You need to make the Lannisters to pay for Jory and the others.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: You're talking about war.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I'm talking about justice.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Only the Lord of Winterfell can call in the bannermen and raise an army.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: A Lannister put his spear through your father's leg. The Kingslayer rides to Casterly Rock where no one can touch -

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: You want me to march on Casterly Rock?!

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: You're not a boy anymore. They attacked your father. They've already started the war. It's your duty to represent your House when your father can't.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: And it's not your duty, because it's not your House.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Where's Bran?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I don't know. It's not my House.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Robb?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: All alone in the deep dark woods.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I'm not alone, my brother is with me.

Name: wildling
Speaker: Wildling
Interaction: I don't see him. Got him hidden under your cloak?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Oh, that's a pretty pin. Silver.

Name: wildling
Speaker: Wildling
Interaction: We'll take the pin. And the horse. Get down… Be quick about it.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I can't. The saddle, the straps.

Name: wildling
Speaker: Wildling
Interaction: What's wrong with you? You some kind of cripple?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell and if you don't let me be, I'll have you all killed!

Name: wildling
Speaker: Wildling
Interaction: Cut his little cock off and stuff it in his mouth.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: the boy's worth nothing dead. Benjen Stark's own blood. Think what Mance would give us.

Name: wildling
Speaker: Wildling
Interaction: Piss on Mance rayder and piss on the North. We're going as far south as south goes. There ain't no white walkers down in Dorne.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Drop the knife. Let him go and I'll let you live.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Robb!

Name: wildling
Speaker: Wildling
Interaction: Shut up! Drop the blade!

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: No, don't.

Name: wildling
Speaker: Wildling
Interaction: Do it.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Are you all right?

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Yes, it doesn't hurt.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Tough little lad. In the Iron Islands, you're not a man until you've killed your first enemy. Well done.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Have you lost your mind? What if you'd missed?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: He would have killed you and cut Bran's throat.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: You don't have the right -

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: To what, to save your brother's life? It was the only thing to do, so I did it.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: What about her?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Give me my life, my lord, and I'm yours.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: We'll keep her alive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Mord! Turnkey! Mord! Mord!

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: Dwarf man making noise!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: How would you like to be rich?

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: Dwarf man still making noise.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My family is rich. We have gold, lots of gold. I'm prepared to give you lots of gold.

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: No gold!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Well, I don't have it here.

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: No gold! Fuck off.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I don't want to practice today.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: No?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: They killed Jory. My father is hurt. I don't care about stupid wooden swords.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: You are troubled.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Yes -

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Good! Trouble is the perfect time for training. When you are dancing in the meadow with your dolls and kittens, this is not when fighting happens.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I don't like dolls and k -

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: You're not here. You're with your trouble. If you're with your trouble when fighting happens…

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: More trouble for you. Just so… How can you be quick as a snake, or as quiet as a shadow, when you are somewhere else? You are fearing for your father, hmm? That is right. Do you pray to the gods?

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: The old and the new.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: There is only one god. And his name is death. And there is only one thing we say to death - “Not today.”

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: She has to eat a whole heart? I hope that wasn't my horse.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: She's doing well.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: She'll never keep it down.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Tell me what she is saying.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The prince is riding. I have heard the thunder of the hooves. Swift as the wind he rides. His enemies will cower before him… and their wives will weep tears of blood.”

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: She's going to have a boy.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: He won't be a real Targaryen. He won't be a true dragon.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The stallion who mounts the world.” The stallion, is the khal of khals. He shall unite the people into a single khalasar. All the people of the world will be his herd.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: A prince rides inside me! And he shall be called Rhaego!

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: They love her.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: She truly is a queen today.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Don't let them see you carrying a sword in Vaes Dothrak. You know the law.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: It's not my law.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: They don't belong to you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Whatever is hers is also mine.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Once, perhaps.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: If I sell one egg, I'll have enough to buy a ship. Two eggs - a ship and an army.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: And you have all three.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: I need a large army… I'm the last hope of a dynasty, Mormont. The greatest dynasty this world has ever seen, on my shoulders since I was five years old and no one has ever given me what they gave to her in that tent. Never. Not a piece of it… How can I carry what I need to carry without it? Hmm? Who can rule without wealth, or fear, or love? Oh, you stand there, all nobility and honor. You don't think I see you looking at my little sister, hmm? Don't think I know what you want? I don't care. You can have her. She can be queen of the savages and dine on the finest bloody horseparts, and you can dine on whichever parts of her you like. But let me go.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: You can go, but you can't have the eggs.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: You swore an oath to me. Does loyalty mean nothing to you?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: It means everything to me.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: And yet here you stand?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: And here I stand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord!

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: Noise again!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: About the gold -

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Listen to me! Listen to me! Sometimes possession… is an abstract concept. When they captured me they took my purse, but the gold is still mine.

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: Where?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Where? I don't know where, but when they free me -

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: You want free? Go be free.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Have you ever heard the phrase “Rich as a Lannister”? Of course you have. You're a smart man. You know who the Lannisters are. I am a Lannister. Tyrion, son of Tywin! And of course, you have also heard the phrase, “a Lannister always pays his debts.” If you deliver a message from me to Lady Arryn, I will be in your debt. I will owe you gold. If you deliver the message and I live, which I very much intend to do.

Name: mord
Speaker: Mord
Interaction: What message?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Tell her I wish to confess my crimes.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You wish to confess your crimes?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Yes, my lady. I do, my lady.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Skycells always break them. Speak, Imp. Meet your gods as an honest man.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Where do I begin, my lords and ladies? I'm a vile man, I confess it. My crimes and sins are beyond counting. I have lied and cheated, gambled and whored. I'm not particularly good at violence, but I'm good at convincing others to do violence for me. You want specifics, I suppose. When I was seven, I saw a servant girl bathing in the river. I stole her robe. She was forced to return to the castle, naked and in tears. I close my eyes, I can still see her tits bouncing. When I was ten, I stuffed my uncle's boots with goatshit. When confronted with my crime, I blamed a squire. Poor boy was flogged and… I escaped justice. When I was twelve, I milked my eel into a pot of turtle stew. I flogged the one-eyed snake. I skinned my sausage. I made the bald man cry into the turtle stew, which I do believe my sister ate. At least I hope she did. I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel -

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Silence!

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: What happened next?!

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: What do you think you're doing?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Confessing my crimes.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Lord Tyrion, you are accused of hiring a man to slay my son Bran in his bed, and of conspiring to murder my sister's husband; Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Oh, I'm very sorry. I don't know anything about all that.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You've had your little joke. I trust you enjoyed it. Mord, take him back to the dungeon. But this time find a smaller cell, with a steeper floor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Is this how justice is done in the Vale? you accuse me of crimes, I deny them, so you throw me in a cell to freeze and starve? Where is the King's Justice? I'm accused and demand a trial.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: If you're tried and found guilty, then by the king's own laws you will pay with your life.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I understand the law.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: We have no executioner in the Eyrie. Life is more elegant here. Open the Moon Door.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You want a trial, my Lord Lannister. Very well. My son will listen to whatever you have to say, and you will hear his judgement. Then you will leave, by one door or the other.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: No need to bother Lord Robin. I demand a trial by combat.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You have that right.

Name: knight
Speaker: Knight
Interaction: My lady, I beg the honor. Let me be your champion.

Name: knight
Speaker: Knight
Interaction: The honor should be mine. For the love I bore your lord husband let me avenge his death.

Name: knight
Speaker: Knight
Interaction: I'll fight for you, my Lady.

Name: knight
Speaker: Knight
Interaction: It'll be my honor.

Name: knight
Speaker: Knight
Interaction: The honor should be mine.

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: Make the bad man fly!

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Ser Vardis… You're quiet. Did you want to avenge my husband?

Name: vardis egen
Speaker: Vardis Egen
Interaction: With all my heart, my Lady. But the Imp is half my size. It would be shameful to slaughter such a man and call it justice.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Agreed.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You demanded a trial by combat.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Now I demand a champion. I have that right, same as you.

Name: vardis egen
Speaker: Vardis Egen
Interaction: My Lady, I would gladly fight the Imp's champion for you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: I wouldn't be too glad, ser. I name my brother, Jaime Lannister.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: The Kingslayer is hundreds of miles from here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Send a raven for him, I'm happy to wait.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: The trial will be today.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Do I have a volunteer?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Anyone?... Anyone?

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: I think that we can assume that no one is willing -

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: I'll stand for the dwarf.

Name: lancel lannister
Speaker: Lancel Lannister
Interaction: More wine, your Grace?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Oh, what was I saying?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: A simpler time.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: It was! It was. You're too young to remember. Wasn't it, Selmy?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: It was, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: The enemy was right there in the open, vicious as you like, all but sending you a bloody invitation. Nothing like today.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Sounds exhilarating.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Exhilarating, yes. Not as exhilarating as those balls and masquerades you like to throw. You ever fucked a Riverlands girl?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Once, I think.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You think? I think you'd remember. Back in our day, you weren't a real man until you fucked a girl from each of the Seven Kingdoms and the Riverlands. We called it “making the eight.”

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Those were some lucky girls.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: You ever make the eight, Barristan?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: I don't believe so, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Those were the days!

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: What days were those? The ones where half of Westeros fought the other half and millions died? Or before that, when the Mad King slaughtered women and babies because the voices in his head told him they deserved it? Or way before that when dragons burned whole cities to the ground?

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Easy, boy. You might be my brother, but you're speaking to the King.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: I suppose it was all rather heroic. If you were drunk enough and had some poor Riverlands whore to shove your price inside and “make the eight.”

Name: man
Speaker: Man
Interaction: They burned most everything in the Riverlands, our fields, our granaries, our homes. They took our women and then they took ‘em again. When they was done, they butchered them as if they was animals. They covered our children in pitch and lit them on fire.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Brigands, most likely.

Name: man
Speaker: Man
Interaction: They weren't thieves, they didn't steal nothing. They even left something behind, your Grace.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: It's the King's Hand you're addressing, not the king. The king is hunting.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Fish. The sigil of House Tully. Isn't that your wife's House - Tully - my Lord Hand?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: These men, were they flying a sigil? … A banner.

Name: man
Speaker: Man
Interaction: None, your… Hand. The one who was leading them… Taller by a foot than any man I've ever met, saw him cut the blacksmith, saw him take the head off a horse with a single swing of his sword.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: That sounds like someone we know. The Mountain.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You're describing Ser Gregor Clegane.
