Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Why should Ser Gregor turn brigand? The man is an anointed knight.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I've heard him called “Tywin Lannister's mad dog.” I'm sure you have as well. Can you think of any reason the Lannisters might possibly have for being angry with your wife?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: If the Lannisters were to order attacks on villages under the king's protection, it would be -

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: It would be almost as brazen as attacking the Hand of the King in the streets of the capital.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Wel…

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I cannot give you back your homes or restore your dead to life. But perhaps I can give you justice in the name of our king, Robert. Lord Beric Dondarrion.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You shall have the command. Assemble 100 men and ride to Ser Gregor's keep.

Name: beric dondarrion
Speaker: Beric Dondarrion
Interaction: As you command.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, the First of his Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, I charge you to bring the king's justice to the false knight Gregor Clegane and all those who shared in his crimes. I denounce him and attaint him. I strip him of all ranks and titles of all lands and holdings, and sentence him to death.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: My lord… This… This is a drastic action. It would be better to wait for King Robert's return.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Grand Maester Pycelle.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: My Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Send a raven to Casterly Rock. Inform Tywin Lannister that he has been summoned to court to answer for the crimes of his bannermen. He will arrive within the fortnight, or be branded an enemy of the crown and a traitor to the realm.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: A bold move, my Lord, and admirable. But is it wise to yank the lion's tail? Tywin Lannister is the richest man in all the Seven Kingdoms. Gold wins wars, not soldiers.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Then how come Robert is king and not Tywin Lannister?

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: Is it over?

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: You don't fight with honor!

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: No. He did.

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: Can I make the little man fly now?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Not this little man. This little man is going home. I believe you have something of mine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: A Lannister always pays his debts.

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: You wear your hair like a real southern lady now.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Well, why shouldn't I? We're in the south.

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: It's important to remember where you come from. I'm not sure your mother would like these new styles.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: My mother isn't from the North.

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: I'm aware of that.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Why do you care? Do you even have hair under there?

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: Yes. I have hair.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I've never seen it.

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: Would you like to?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No. Where are you from anyway, the north or the south?

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: I come from a very small village in -

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Oh, wait. I just realized… I don't care.

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: Sansa -

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Septa.

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: Now you are being rude.

Name: mordane
Speaker: Mordane
Interaction: My prince.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: My prince.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: My lady. I fear I have behaved monstrously the past few weeks. With your permission?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: It's beautiful. Like the one your mother wears.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: You'll be queen one day, it's only fitting that you should look the part. Will you forgive me for my rudeness?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: There's nothing to forgive.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: You're my lady. One day we'll be married in the throne room. Lords and ladies from all over the Seven Kingdoms will come, from the last hearth in the North, to the salt shore of the south. And you will be queen over all of them. I'll never disrespect you again. I'll never be cruel to you again. Do you understand me? You're my lady now, from this day, until my last day.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Stop! Stop! What are you doing?!

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Going to King's Landing.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: In a turnip cart?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: I'll find a ship heading south in White Harbor.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: And you can afford that?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Some of my friends are more generous than others.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: There's a thousand girls like you in King's Landing.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: I'll have lots of company…

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Yes, you'll be very popular until some fat lord comes to visit with a big belly and a little prick and he can't get it up so he knocks all your teeth out.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: And what will happen to me if I stay here? Will I become Lady Greyjoy, Mistress of the Iron Islands?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Don't be a fool.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: I hear Jaime Lannister attacked Lord Stark in the streets of King's Landing. Every man for a hundred miles will be marching off to war soon and most of them will never come back, there's nothing more for me here. Let's go, Steffon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Let me see it one more time?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: See what?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I'm going to miss you!

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: I know.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'm sending you both back to Winterfell.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: What?!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Listen -

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: What about Joffrey?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Are you dying because of your leg? Is that why you're sending us home?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What? No.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Please, Father. Please don't.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: You can't. I've got my lessons with Syrio. I'm finally getting good.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: This isn't a punishment. I want you back in Winterfell for your own safety.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Can't we take Syrio back with us?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Who cares about your stupid dancing teacher? I can't go. I'm supposed to marry Prince Joffrey. I love him and I'm meant to be his queen and have his babies.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Seven hells.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: When you're old enough, I'll make you a match with someone who's worthy of you, someone who's brave and gentle and strong -

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I don't want someone brave and gentle and strong. I want him! He'll be the greatest king that ever was, a golden lion, and I'll give him sons with beautiful blond hair.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: The lion's not his sigil, idiot. He's a stag, like his father.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He is not. He's nothing like that old drunk king.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Go on, girls. Get your septa and start packing your things.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Wait!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Come on!

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: It's not fair!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Lord Orys Baratheon, black of hair.” “Axel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Lyonel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Steffon Baratheon, black of hair.” “Robert Baratheon, black of hair.” “Joffrey Baratheon… golden-haired.”

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Daenerys! Where's my sister?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Stop him.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Where is she? I'm here for the feast. The whore's feast.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Come.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Get your hands off me! No one touches the dragon!

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Khal Drogo! I'm here for the feast.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Khal Drogo says there is a place for you. Back there.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: That is no place for a king.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: You are no king.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Keep away from me!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Viserys, please.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: There she is.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Put the sword down. They'll kill us all.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: They can't kill us. They can't shed blood in their sacred city. But I can. I want what I came for. I want the crown he promised me. He bought you. But he never paid for you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Tell him I want what was bargained for or I'm taking you back. He can keep the baby. I'll cut it out and leave it for him.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: What's he saying?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: He says yes. You shall have a golden crown, that men shall tremble to behold.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: That was all I wanted. W-what was promised.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: No! You cannot touch me! I am the dragon! I am the dragon! I want my crown! Ahh!

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Look away Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: No.

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: No. Dany! Dany, tell them, make them! You can't!

Name: viserys targaryen
Speaker: Viserys Targaryen
Interaction: Dany please!

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: A crown for a king.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Khaleesi…

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: He was no dragon. Fire cannot kill a dragon.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Summoned to court to answer for the crimes of your bannerman Gregor Clegane, the Mountain

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Attacking him was stupid.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Lannisters don't act like fools.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Catelyn Stark took my brother.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Why is he still alive?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Tyrion?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Ned Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: One of our men interfered, speared him through the leg before I could finish him.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: It wouldn't have been clean.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Clean...

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I could care less what anyone thinks of me.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Now that's what you want people to think of you.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: It's the truth.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: When you hear them whispering "Kingslayer" behind your back, doesn't it bother you?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Of course it bothers me.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I didn't realize you placed such a high value on my brother's life.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: He's a Lannister. He might be the lowest of the Lannisters, but he's one of us.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: So the lion does concern himself with the opinions of..

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: No, it's not an opinion, it's a fact!

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Hmm.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You're in pain.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I've had worse, my lady.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Perhaps it's time to go home.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The South doesn't seem to agree with you.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I know the truth Jon Arryn died for.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Do you, Lord Stark? Is that why you called me here, to pose me riddles?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Has he done this before?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Jaime would have killed him.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: My brother is worth a thousand of your friend.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Your brother Or your lover?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: The Targaryens wed brothers and sisters for 300 years to keep bloodlines pure.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Jaime and I are more than brother and sister. We shared a womb. We came into this world together. We belong together.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: My son saw you with him.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Do you love your children?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: With all my heart.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: No more than I love mine.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And they are all Jaime's.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Thank the Gods.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You've always hated him.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Hated him? I worshiped him.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: When the King returns from his hunt, I'll tell him the truth.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: And what of my wrath, Lord Stark? You should have taken the realm for yourself.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I've made many mistakes in my life, but that wasn't one of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Oh, but it was.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Come here.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: No no no no! Is that what they teach you up in the North? And you-- wherever you're from, do you have any idea how ridiculous you sound? Either of you understand a thing that I'm saying?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Yes, My Lord.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Let's start over, shall we? You be the man and you be the woman.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Why don't you join us, My Lord?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I'm saving myself for another.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: What she doesn't know won't hurt her.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: A stupid saying.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: She must be very beautiful.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: No, not really. Impeccable bloodlines though.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: I do believe my lordo s in love.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: For many years. Most of my life really.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: Is she still married to him?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Oh no. He got himself killed before the wedding.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: And what do you want?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Oh, everything, my dear. Everything there is.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: You're a very lucky girl. Do you know that?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Where is it you come from?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: The Iron Islands.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: They far away?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: You've never heard of the Iron Islands?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Trust me, you've never heard where I'm from neither.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Trust me, My Lord. You're not living in the wilderness anymore.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: And what's that?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Lord.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Why?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Why? What do you mean why? My father is Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: What's that got to do with you? If your father's lord, how can you be lord too?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I will be lord after my father.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: So you're not lord now?

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: No, you...You having a go at me? Is that it?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: I just don't understand how you Southerners do things.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I'm not a Southerner.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: You're from South of the wall. That makes you a Southerner to me.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: You're an impudent little wench, aren't you?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Couldn't say, My Lord. Don't know what "impunent" means.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Impudent. It means rude. Disrespectful.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Theon Greyjoy! The lady is our guest.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: I thought she was our prisoner.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Are the two mutually exclusive in your experience?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Chances are I won't be nearby the next time that happens.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: I'm used to worse than him.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: I'm used to men who could chew that boy up and pick their teeth with his bones.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Why did you come here?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Didn't mean to come here. Meant to get much further South than this.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Why? What are you afraid of?

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: There's things that sleep in the day and hunt at night.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Owls and Shadowcats and...

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: I'm not talking about Owls and Shadowcats.

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: The "things" you speak of-- they've been gone for thousands of years.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: They wasn't gone, old man. They was sleeping.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I miss girls.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Why is he alone?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: One blast for a Ranger returning, two for Wildlings, three for...

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: There's no rider.

Name: night watch stable boy
Speaker: Night Watch Stable Boy
Interaction: Whoa, boy, whoa.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: That's my Uncle Benjen's horse.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Ned! It's Robert.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: I should have spent more time with you, shown you how to be a man.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: My fault. Too much wine, missed my thrust.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Robert, my sweet...

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Out, all of you!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You damned fool.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Paper and ink on the table, write down what I say.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: Give it to the council after I'm dead.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I will.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: And my son Help him, Ned. Make him better than me.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I'll, I'll do everything I can to honor your memory.

Name: robert baratheon
Speaker: Robert Baratheon
Interaction: My memory.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Give him milk of the poppy.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: He was reeling from the wine.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: No man could have protected him from himself.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I wonder, Ser Barristan, who gave the king this wine?

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: His squire, from the king's own skin.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: His squire? The Lannister boy?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Such a dutiful boy to make sure his Grace did not lack refreshment.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: His Grace has had a change of heart concerning Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I'm afraid those birds have flown.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: The stallion who mounts the world, has no need for iron chairs.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: According to the prophecy, the stallions will ride to the ends of the world.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: The earth ends at the black salt sea. No horse can cross the poison water.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: The earth does not end at the sea, there are many dirts beyond the sea.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: Not dirt. Lands.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Lands, yes...

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: Let's speak no more of wooden horses and iron chairs.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: It's not a chair. It's a...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: A chair for a King to sit upon, or a Queen.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: A King does not need a chair to sit upon. He only needs a horse.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Can't you help me make him understand?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The Dothraki do things in their own time, for their own reasons.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: My brother was a fool, I know, but he was the rightful heir to the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Forgive me, Khaleesi, but your ancestor Aegon the Conqueror didn't seize six of the kingdoms because they were his right.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: And because he had dragons.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Ah well, having a few dragons makes things easier.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You don't believe it.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Have you ever seen a dragon, Khaleesi? I believe what my eyes and ears report.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Well, I'll come with you.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: No no, don't trouble yourself. Enjoy the market. I'll rejoin you soon enough.

Name: little bird
Speaker: Little Bird
Interaction: Psst, Jorah the Andal.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: Virzetha gizikhven! Mra qora! Mra qora!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: My son already has his name, but I'll try your summerwine.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: My Lady, you are from Westeros.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: You have the honor of addressing Daenerys of the House Targaryen.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: Princess.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Rise. I'd still like to taste that wine.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: That? Dornish swill.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You honor me, Ser.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: The honor...the honor is all mine.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Huh-uh, huh-uh.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: You know there are many in your homeland that pray for your return, princess.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I hope to repay your kindness someday.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Rakharo.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Huh.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Is something wrong?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: I have a thirst. Open it.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: The wine is for the Khaleesi. It's not for the likes of you.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Open it.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Pour.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: It would be a crime to drink a wine this rich without at least giving it time to breathe.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Do as he says.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: As the princess commands.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: Sweet, isn't it? Can you smell the fruit, Ser? Taste it, My Lord.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: You first.

Name: wine merchant
Speaker: Wine Merchant
Interaction: Me? I'm afraid I am not worthy of the vintage.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You will drink.

Name: doreah
Speaker: Doreah
Interaction: Khaleesi! Stop him!

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Come.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Here you begin anew.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I do, my lord.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: You'll want to take your vow before a heart tree as your Uncle did.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Yes, my lord.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: You'll find a Weirwood a mile North of the Wall. And your old Gods too, maybe.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: my lord, might I go as well?

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Does house Tarly keep the old Gods?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: No, my lord.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: The Night's Watch is my house now.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: As you wish, lad.

Name: jaremy rykker
Speaker: Jaremy Rykker
Interaction: Rangers with me.

Name: othell yarwyck
Speaker: Othell Yarwyck
Interaction: Builders!

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: Samwell, you will assist me in the rookery and library.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Will I serve the Lord Commander's meals and fetch hot water for his bath.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: Certainly. And keep a fire burning in his chambers.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Do you take me for a servant?

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: We took you for a man of The Night's Watch.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: May I go?

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: As you wish.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Jon, wait! Don't you see what they're doing?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I see Ser Alliser's revenge, that's all.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Fair? I was singing for a high lord at Acorn Hall when he put his hand on my leg and he wanted to see my cock.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I thought you were caught stealing a wheel of cheese for your starving sister?

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: You think I was gonna tell a bunch of strangers that a high lord tried to grab my cock?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Could you sing me a song, Pyp? I'd like to hear a song.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Now listen to me. The old man is the Lord Commander of The Night's Watch.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I just, I always wanted to be a Ranger.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: I always wanted to be a Wizard.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: She won't care.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And what should I do with a hundred swords?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Strike! Tonight while the castle sleeps.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What about Stannis?

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Saving the Seven Kingdoms from Cersei and delivering them to Stannis?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Stannis is your older brother.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: This isn't about the bloody line of succession.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Stannis is a commander. He's led men into war twice.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Yes, he's a good soldier. Everyone knows that. So was Robert.

Name: renly baratheon
Speaker: Renly Baratheon
Interaction: Do you still believe good soldiers make good kings?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I will not dishonor Robert's last hours by shedding blood in his halls and dragging frightened children from their beds.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You will sail to dragonstone tonight.

Name: tomard
Speaker: Tomard
Interaction: Yes, My Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Now leave us.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: My Lord protector.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The King has no true born sons.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: So when the King dies...

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The throne passes to his brother Lord Stannis.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: So it would seem. Unless...

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: There is no "unless".

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: And he cannot take the throne without your help.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Do you have a shred of honor?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: You are now Hand of the King and Protector of the Realm.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: We?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: You'll need someone to share these burdens. I assure you, my price would be modest.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What you suggest is treason.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Only if we lose.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Make peace with the Lannisters, you say. With the people who tried to murder my boy..

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: No. I won't do it.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: So it will be Stannis and war?

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: There is no other choice. He is the heir.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: So why did you call me here? Not for my wisdom, clearly.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You promised Catelyn you would help me.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Look at you. You know what you want me to do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I thought he'd leave me alone, now that my brother is gone.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: He will not have my son.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: Moon of my life. Are you hurt?

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: Jorah the Andal, I heard what you did.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Liar!

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You condemn yourself with your own mouth, Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Ser Barristan is a good man, a loyal man. Do him no harm.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You think he stands alone?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Kill him! Kill all of them, I command it!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Commander! Take the Queen and her children into custody.

Name: janos slynt
Speaker: Janos Slynt
Interaction: Men of the Watch!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I want no bloodshed.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Now!

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: I did warn you not to trust me.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Yah! Left high, left low.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Right low, lunge right.

Name: steward of house stark
Speaker: Steward Of House Stark
Interaction: If you break anything, the Septa will have my head. What is...

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Your sister knew perfectly well we were to leave today.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: She didn't forget. She's with her dancing master.

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Hush! Go back to your room.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: What is it? What's happening?

Name: septa mordane
Speaker: Septa Mordane
Interaction: Do as I told you. Run!

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: This way! Left, right.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: You said right, but you went left.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: And now you are a dead girl.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Only 'cause you lied.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: My tongue lied.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: I was so. I watched, but you...

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Watching is not seeing, dead girl.

Name: meryn trant
Speaker: Meryn Trant
Interaction: Arya Stark, come with us.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: And why is it that Lord Eddard is sending Lannister men in place of his own? I am wondering.

Name: meryn trant
Speaker: Meryn Trant
Interaction: Mind your place, dancing master.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: My father wouldn't send you.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: And I don't have to go with you if I don't want.

Name: maryn trant
Speaker: Maryn Trant
Interaction: Take her.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Are you men or snakes, that you would threaten a child?

Name: kings guard
Speaker: Kings Guard
Interaction: Get out of my way, little man.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: I am Syrio Forel.

Name: kings guard
Speaker: Kings Guard
Interaction: Foreign bastard.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: And you will be speaking to me with more respect.

Name: meryn trant
Speaker: Meryn Trant
Interaction: Kill the Braavosi. Bring the girl.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Arya child, we are done with dancing for the day.

Name: meryn trant
Speaker: Meryn Trant
Interaction: Bloody oafs.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Be gone now, Arya.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Come with me. Run.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: The first sword of Braavos does not run.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: What do we say to the God of death?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Not today.

Name: syrio forel
Speaker: Syrio Forel
Interaction: Go.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Not today. Not today.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Stay away from me.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: Who do you think sent me?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Needle.

Name: stable boy
Speaker: Stable Boy
Interaction: There she is.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: What do you want?

Name: stable boy
Speaker: Stable Boy
Interaction: I want you, wolf girl. Come here.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Leave me be. My father's a lord. He'll reward you.

Name: stable boy
Speaker: Stable Boy
Interaction: She'll reward me, the Queen!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Stay away!

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Lord Stark, you must be thirsty.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Varys.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: I promise you it isn't poisoned.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What about my daughters?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The younger one seems to have escaped the castle.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: And Sansa?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Still engaged to Joffrey.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: And would again, My Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The madness of mercy. That she might save her children.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Ah, the children. It is always the innocents who suffer.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: The Queen can't kill me. Cat holds her brother.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The wrong brother sadly.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: If that's true, then slit my throat and be done with it.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Not today, My Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Tell me something, Varys.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: The Realm, My Lord.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: It's Othor, without a doubt.

Name: othell yarwyck
Speaker: Othell Yarwyck
Interaction: The other one is Jafer Flowers, My Lord, less the hand the wolf tore off.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Any sign of Benjen or the rest of his party?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Just these two, My Lord. Been dead awhile, I'd say.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Mmm.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: The smell.

Name: othell yarwyck
Speaker: Othell Yarwyck
Interaction: What smell?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: There is none.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: We should burn them.

Name: othell yarwyck
Speaker: Othell Yarwyck
Interaction: Snow's not wrong, My Lord.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: I want Maester Aemon to examine them first.

Name: othell yarwyck
Speaker: Othell Yarwyck
Interaction: You heard him.

Name: ser alliser
Speaker: Ser Alliser
Interaction: Lord Commander, Maester Aemon awaits you in his chambers. A raven from King's Landing.

Name: nights watch brother
Speaker: Nights Watch Brother
Interaction: Come on, move 'em out.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Bring me a horn of ale, Snow, and pour one for yourself.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Is there any word of my father?

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Sit.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: I hope you're not thinking of doing anything stupid.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: My sisters were in King's Landing too.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: I'm sure they'll be treated gently.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Your father has proved to be an awful traitor, dear.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: King Robert's body was still warm when Lord Eddard began plotting to steal Joffrey's rightful throne.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He wouldn't do that. He knows how much I love Joffrey.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Sansa sweetling, you are innocent of any wrong.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: A child born of a traitor's seed is no fit consort for our King.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No, I'm not.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: The girl is innocent, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Little dove, you must write to Lady Catelyn and your brother, the eldest.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Robb.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Word of your father's arrest will reach him soon, no doubt.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: If...if I could see my father, talk to him about...

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: You disappoint me, child.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I only meant that...what will happen to him?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: That depends.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: On...on what?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: On your brother. And on you.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Treason? Sansa wrote this?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: It is your sister's hand, but the Queen's words.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Joffrey puts my father in chains, now he wants his ass kissed?

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: This is a royal command, My Lord.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: I won't refuse. His Grace summons me to King's Landing, I'll go to King's Landing.

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: I'm hungry.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Hush now, darling. You just ate.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: You will not support us then? Do I understand you correctly?

Name: robin arryn
Speaker: Robin Arryn
Interaction: But I'm hungry!

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Soon, love, soon.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: That is what I ask.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Go on, sweet. Time for your bath. I'll feed you after.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: If you fear for the safety of your son...

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: Of course I fear for the safety of my son!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: And that is why we have to stop them.

Name: lysa arryn
Speaker: Lysa Arryn
Interaction: The knights of the Vale will stay in the Vale where they belong, to protect their Lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone.

Name: shagga
Speaker: Shagga
Interaction: Best for Tyrion son of Tywin. Not best for me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And feed it to the goats, yes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Uncle. Father.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: The rumors of your demise were unfounded.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Sorry to disappoint you.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: And who are these Companions of yours?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: This is Shagga Son of Dolf, Chieftain of the Stone Crows.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: You wouldn't know him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: May I present My Lord Father, Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: You left us no choice. The honor of the House was at stake.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: We have our differences, Jaime and I.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: He's been covering himself in glory.

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: Jaime smashed the River Lords at the Golden Tooth, and now lays siege to Riverrun, Catelyn Stark's homeland.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And the Starks? Lord Eddard?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Is our hostage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: How did my sweet sister persuade the King to imprison his dear friend Ned?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Robert Baratheon is dead.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My sister rules, you mean.

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: Stark's son has called his banners.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: A green boy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Maybe. Though the boy does have a certain belligerence.

Name: messenger
Speaker: Messenger
Interaction: If it please My Lord, Ser Addam bids me report that the Northmen have crossed the neck.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws.

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: At once, My Lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors.

Name: shagga
Speaker: Shagga
Interaction: Only if the half man fights with us.

Name: rodrik cassel
Speaker: Rodrik Cassel
Interaction: The scouts report Lord Tywin moves north.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: No, we need to get around him and break Jaime Lannister's siege of Riverrun.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at The Twins.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Lord Frey controls that bridge.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Robb's right.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: So what's it gonna be? Do we move against Jaime or Lord Tywin?

Name: stark guard
Speaker: Stark Guard
Interaction: Your pardon, my lords.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Don't worry, lad.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Where did you find him?

Name: stark guard
Speaker: Stark Guard
Interaction: In the brush above the encampment.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: How high did you get?

Name: lannister scout
Speaker: Lannister Scout
Interaction: 20,000. Maybe more.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Robb.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Tell Lord Tywin, Winter is coming for him.

Name: lannister scout
Speaker: Lannister Scout
Interaction: Yes, My Lord. Thank you, My Lord.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Are you touched, boy?! Letting him go?

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: You call me boy again.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Go on.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Oi.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: It is also the wish of His Grace, that his loyal servant Janos Slynt, Commander of the City Watch...

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Ser Aron.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Be at once raised to the rank of Lord.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Lord Gyles.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: And granted the ancient seat of Harrenhal, and that his sons and grandsons shall hold this honor after him, until the end of time.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Ser Barristan Selmy.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Your Grace, I am yours to command.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Rise, Ser Barristan.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Your Grace, the Kingsguard is a sworn brotherhood.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your King's?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: You let my father die.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Your Grace...

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: The Council has determined that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: The man who profaned his blade with the blood of the King he had sworn to defend!

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Careful, Ser.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: We have nothing but gratitude for your long service, good Ser.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: A hall to die in and men to bury me.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: A naked Knight, apparently.

Name: barristan selmy
Speaker: Barristan Selmy
Interaction: Even now I could cut through the five of you like carving a cake!

Name: kings landing page
Speaker: Kings Landing Page
Interaction: If any man in this hall has other matters to set before His Grace, let him speak now or go forth and hold his silence.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Come forward, My Lady.

Name: kings landing page
Speaker: Kings Landing Page
Interaction: The Lady Sansa of House Stark.

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Do you have some business for the King and the Council, Sansa?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: I do.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father, Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Treason is a noxious weed.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Let her speak.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Thank you, Your Grace.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Do you deny your father's crime?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No, My Lords. I know he must be punished.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: He said I wasn't the King. Why did he say that?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He was badly hurt.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: A childo s faith Such sweet innocence.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Treason is treason!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Anything else?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: If you still have any affection in your heart for me, please do me this kindness, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Your sweet words have moved me.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: He will.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: You've seen better days, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Another visit? lt seems you're my last friend.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: No, no, many still love you. Sansa came to court this morning to plead for your life.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: On her knees begging for me. Hm! Did you laugh with the others?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: You do me wrong, my lord. Your blood is the last thing l want.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: l don't know what you want. l've given up trying to guess.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: When l was still a boy - before they cut my balls off with a hot knife - l traveled with a group of actors through the free cities. They taught me that each man has a role to play. The same is true at court. l am the master of whisperers. My role is to be sly, obsequious and without scruples. l'm a good actor, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Huh. Can you free me from this pit?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: l could. But will l? No. As l said, I'm no hero.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: What do you want? Tell me. No riddles, no stories. Tell me, what do you want?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Peace. Did you know that your son is marching south with an army of Northmen? Loyal lad. Fighting for his father's freedom.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Robb? He's just a boy.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Boys have been conquerors before. But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights is the king's the late king's brother. Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne. He is a proven battle commander and he is utterly without mercy.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Stannis Baratheon is Robert's true heir. The throne is his by rights.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life. lt would be a shame to throw it away. Cersei is no fool. She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You want me to serve the woman who murdered my king, who butchered my men, who crippled my son?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: l want you to serve the realm! Tell the queen you will confess your vile treason, tell your son to lay down his sword and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir. Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: You think my life is some precious thing to me? That l would trade my honor for a few more years of... of what? You grew up with actors. You learned their craft and you learnt it well. But l grew up with soldiers. l learned how to die a long time ago.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Pity. Such a pity. What of your daughter's life, my lord? ls that a precious thing to you?

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: lt's a birthday message to his grand-niece Walda.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Or so Walder Frey would have you think.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Keep shooting them down. We can't risk Lord Walder sending word of your movements to the Lannisters.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: He's Grandfather's bannerman. We can't expect his support?

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Expect nothing of Walder Frey and you'll never be surprised. Look.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Father rots in a dungeon. How long before they take his head? We need to cross the Trident and we need to do it now.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Just march up to his gates and tell him you're crossing. We've got five times his numbers. You can take the Twins if you have to.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Not in time. Tywin Lannister marches north as we speak.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: The Freys have held the crossing for 600 years, and for 600 years they have never failed to exact their toll.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Have my horse saddled and ready.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Enter the Twins alone and he'll sell you to the Lannisters as he likes.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Or throw you in a dungeon. Or slit your throat.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: My father would do whatever it took to secure our crossing. Whatever it took. lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have other men doing my bargaining for me.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: l agree. l'll go.

Name: everyone
Speaker: Everyone
Interaction: You can't!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: l have known Lord Walder since l was a girl. He would never harm me.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Unless there was a profit in it.

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: What do you want?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: lt is a great pleasure to see you again after so many years, my lord.

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Oh, spare me. Your boy's too proud to come before me himself. What am l supposed to do with you?

Name: stevron frey
Speaker: Stevron Frey
Interaction: Father, you forget yourself. Lady Stark is –

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Who asked you? You're not Lord Frey yet, not until l die. Do l look dead to you?

Name: ryger rivers
Speaker: Ryger Rivers
Interaction: Father, please –

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: l need lessons in courtesy from you, bastard? Your mother would still be a milkmaid if l hadn't squirted you into her belly.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: ls there somewhere we can talk?

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: We're talking right now. Fine. Out! All of you!

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: l'm sure she will give you many sons.

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Huh. Your father didn't come to the wedding.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: He is quite ill, my lord.

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Huh. Didn't come to the last one, either. Or the one before that. Your family has always pissed on me.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: My lord, l –

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Don't deny it. You know it's true. The fine Lord Tully would never marry any of his children to mine.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: l'm sure there were reasons –

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: l didn't need reasons. l needed to get rid of sons and daughters. You see how they pile up? Why are you here?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: To ask you to open your gates, my lord, so my son and his bannermen may cross the Trident and be on their way.

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Why should l let him?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: lf you could climb your own battlements, you would see that he has 20,000 men outside your walls.

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: There will be 20,000 corpses when Tywin Lannister gets here. Don't try and frighten me, Lady Stark. Your husbando s in a cell beneath the Red Keep and your son's got no fur to keep his balls warm.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: You swore an oath to my father.

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Oh, yes, l said some words. And l swore oaths to the crown too, if l remember right. Joffrey's king now, which makes your boy and his corpses-to-be nothing but rebels, it seems to me. lf l had the sense the gods gave a fish, l'd hand you both over to the Lannisters.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Why don't you?

Name: walder frey
Speaker: Walder Frey
Interaction: Stark, Tully, Lannister, Baratheon. Give me one good reason why l should waste a single thought on any of you?

Name: voices outside
Speaker: Voices Outside
Interaction: And engage!

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: When does Aemon think you'll be able to use that hand?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Soon, he says.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Good. You'll be ready for this, then. l thought a wolf was more appropriate for you than a bear so l had a new pommel made. lt's called Longclaw. Works as well for a wolf as a bear, l think.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: This is Valyrian steel.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: lt was my father's sword, his father before him. The Mormonts have carried it for five centuries. lt was meant for my son Jorah. He brought dishonor to our House, but he had the grace to leave the sword before he fled from Westeros.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: My lord, you honor me, but l can't –

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Oh, you can. And you will. l wouldn't be standing here if it wasn't for you and your beast. A bloody dead man tried to kill me, so you'll take it. l'll hear no more about it. ls that understood?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Yes, my lord.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Right. Now, don't think this means l approve of this nonsense with you and Alliser Thorne. That's a man's sword. lt'll take a man to wield it.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: l'll apologize to Ser Alliser tonight.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: No, you won't. l sent him to King's Landing yesterday. The hand that your wolf tore off that thing's wrist – l've ordered Thorne to lay it at the feet of this boy king. That should get young Joffrey's attention. And it, uh, puts a thousand leagues between you and Thorne. Now go and put your sword somewhere safe and bring me my supper.

Name: unidentified nights watchers
Speaker: Unidentified Nights Watchers
Interaction: Well done. Well done.

Name: nights watcher
Speaker: Nights Watcher
Interaction: You earned that, Snow.

Name: nights watcher
Speaker: Nights Watcher
Interaction: Well done.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Go on, let's have a look.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: At what?

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: The sword! Show us the sword.

Name: all
Speaker: All
Interaction: Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword!

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Let's have a look.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Piss off.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Come on, l want to have a look at it in the light. Give it here!

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Look at its eyes.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: What is it?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: l - l can't.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You can't what?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: l'm really not supposed to say.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: And yet you really want to say. You want to say that…

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: There was a raven. l read the message to Maester Aemon. lt's your brother Robb.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: What? What about him?

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: He's heading south. To war. All his bannermen have rallied to his side, they'll keep him safe.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: l should be there. l should be with him.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: lf we do that, they'll never get back across.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Well? What did he say?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Lord Walder has granted your crossing. His men are yours, as well.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Huh.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Less the 400 he will keep here to hold the crossing against any who would pursue you.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: What does he want in return?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: You will be taking on his son Olyvar as your personal squire. He expects a knighthood in good time.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Fine, fine. And?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: And Arya will marry his son Waldron when they both come of age.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: She won't be happy about that. And?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: And when the fighting is done you will marry one of his daughters. Whichever you prefer. He has a number he thinks will be suitable.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: l see. Did you get a look at his daughters?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: l did.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: And?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: One was – Do you consent?

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Can l refuse?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Not if you want to cross.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Then l consent.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Sam said you wanted to see me?

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: l did indeed. Perhaps you would be kind enough to assist me. Tell me, did you ever wonder why the men of the Night's Watch take no wives and father no children?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: No.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: So they will not love. Love is the death of duty. lf the day should ever come when your lord father was forced to choose between honor on the one hand and those he loves on the other, what would he do?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: He would do whatever was right, no matter what.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: Then Lord Stark is one man in 10,000. Most of us are not so strong. What is honor compared to a woman's love? And what is duty against the feel of a newborn son in your arms? Or a brother's smile?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Sam told you.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: We're all human. Oh, we all do our duty when there's no cost to it. Honor comes easy then. Yet sooner or later in every man's life there comes a day when it is not easy. A day when he must choose.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: And this is my day? ls that what you're saying?

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: Oh, it hurts, boy. Oh, yes. l know.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You do not know. No one knows. l may be a bastard, but he is my father and Robb is my brother.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: The gods were cruel when they saw fit to test my vows. They waited till l was old. What could l do when the ravens brought the news from the South

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Who are you?

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: My father was Maekar, the first of his name. My brother Aegon reigned after him when l had refused the throne. And he was followed by his son Aerys whom they called the Mad King.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: You're Aemon Targaryen.

Name: maester aemon
Speaker: Maester Aemon
Interaction: l'm a maester of the Citadel, bound in service to Castle Black and the Night's Watch. l will not tell you to stay or go. You must make that choice yourself and live with it for the rest of your days. As l have.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: My lord… My sun and stars… Drogo.

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: My horse…

Name: cohollo
Speaker: Cohollo
Interaction: Blood of my blood…

Name: khal drogo
Speaker: Khal Drogo
Interaction: No, l must ride.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: He fell from his horse. A Khal who cannot ride is no Khal.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: He's tired, that's all. He needs to rest. We've ridden far enough today. We'll camp here.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: This is no place to camp. A woman does not give us orders. Not even a Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: We'll camp here. Tell them Khal Drogo commanded it.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: You do not command me, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Find Mirri Maz Duur. Bring her to me.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: The witch? l'll bring you her head, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Bring her to me unharmed or Khal Drogo will hear why you denied me.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: Hyah! Hyah!

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: Our scouts tell us the Stark host has moved south from the Twins with Lord Frey's levies in tow. They're a day's march north.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: The boy may lack experience and sense, but he does have a certain mindless provincial courage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Oh, do continue. Didn't mean to interrupt.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: l do hope your savages are going to be of some use, otherwise we've wasted good steel on them.

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: The great hairy one insisted he must have two battleaxes. Heavy black steel, double-sided.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Shagga likes axes.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: When the battle commences, you and your wildlings will be in the vanguard.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: The vanguard? Me and the tribesmen on the front lines?

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: They do seem rather ferocious.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Ferocious? Last night a Moon Brother stabbed a Stone Crow over a sausage. Three Stone Crows seized the Moon Brother and opened his throat. Bronn managed to keep Shagga from chopping off the dead man's cock, which was fortunate, but even still, Ulf is demanding blood money, which Shagga and Gunthor refuse to pay.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: When soldiers lack discipline, the fault lies with their commander.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Surely there are ways to have me killed that would be less detrimental to the war effort.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: There'll be no more discussion on the matter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: lt appears l'm not hungry after all. Excuse me, my lords.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Where did you find one so pretty at this hour?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: l took her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Took her? From whom?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: From, uh, Ser What's-his-name? l don't know. Ginger cunt, three tents down.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And he didn't have anything to say about it?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: He said something.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Well, the odds of me living long enough for him to retaliate have just dropped drastically. We'll be at the vanguard tomorrow.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Oh, well. l, uh, think l'll go and find myself one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Who are you?

Name: prostitute
Speaker: Prostitute
Interaction: Who would you like me to be?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What did your mother call you?

Name: prostitute
Speaker: Prostitute
Interaction: Shae. What did your mother call you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My mother died giving birth to me.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: ls that why l'm here? So we can talk about our mothers?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What sort of accent is that?

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Foreign.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: For-

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: What do you want from me?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What do l want from you? l want you to share my tent. l want you to pour my wine, laugh at my jokes, rub my legs when they're sore after a day's ride. l want you to take no other man to bed for as long as we're together. And l want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world. Which it may well be.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: And what do l get?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: One - safety. No one will hurt you for as long as you're mine. Two - the pleasure of my company, which l have heard is spectacular.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Who told you this? Women you paid?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And three - more gold than you can spend if you lived a thousand years. Do you accept my proposal?

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Let's start with your last night in this world.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Come. He's very strong. No one understands how strong he is.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: He will die tonight, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: He can't. He can't. l won't let him.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Even a queen doesn't have that power. We must go quickly. l've heard there's a good port in Asshai.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l won't leave him.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: He's already gone, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Even if he dies, why would l run? l am khaleesi, and my my son will be khal after Drogo.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: This isn't Westeros, where men honor blood. Here they only honor strength. There will be fighting after Drogo dies. Whoever wins that fight will be the new khal. He won't want any rivals. Your boy will be plucked from your breast and given to the dogs.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: The wound has festered.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: You did this, witch.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Stop it! l don't want her hurt.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: No? No? You don't want her hurt? Pray we don't hurt you, too. You let this witch put her hands on our Khal.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Rein in your tongue. She is still your Khaleesi.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: Only while the blood of my blood lives. When he dies, she is nothing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l have never been nothing. l am the blood of the dragon.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: The dragons are all dead, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l think you should wear your armor tonight, ser.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: l think you're right.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: You've saved me once more.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: And now you must save him.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: He's beyond the healer's skills. All l can do is ease his path.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Save him and l will free you. l swear it. You must know a way. Some – some magic.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: There is a spell. Some would say death is cleaner.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Do it. Save him.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: There is a price.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You'll have gold, whatever you want.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: lt's not a matter of gold. This is blood magic. Only death pays for life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
