Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: My death?

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: No, not your death, Khaleesi. Bring me his horse.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Khaleesi, do not do this thing. Let me kill this witch.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Kill her and you kill your khal.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: This is blood magic. lt is forbidden.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l am your khaleesi. l tell you what is forbidden.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: Go. Now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Take her and leave. Take her!

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: You must go also, lady. Once l begin to sing, no one must enter the tent. The dead will dance here tonight.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: No one will enter.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Bring him back to me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l have to save him.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: This must not be.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: This must be.

Name: qotho
Speaker: Qotho
Interaction: Witch.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: Nothing good will come of this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: No, you can't.

Name: irri
Speaker: Irri
Interaction: Khaleesi!

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: No further, horselord.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Are you hurt?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: The baby –

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Hmm?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: is coming.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Fetch the midwives.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: They will not come. They say she is cursed.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: They'll come or l'll have their heads.

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: The witch - she can bring baby. l hear her say so.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Are you in agony, my lion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: No.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: You look like you're in agony. The fire is burning your pretty soft skin.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Ah! Damn you, woman. Are you immune to pain?

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Just used to it.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Drink.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Let's play a new game.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: There's a Braavosi knife game l could teach you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Does it involve the potential for losing fingers?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Not if you win.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: No! No fire games, no knife games. Let's do something l'm good at.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: What are you good at?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: l happen to be a great judge of character.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: This sounds like a boring game.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: lt's not. Here's how it works - l make a statement about your past. lf l'm right, you drink. lf l'm wrong, l drink. And no lying. l'll know if you're lying.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: l don't want to play this game.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Fine. Bronn first. Your father beat you.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: But my mother hit harder.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: You killed your first man before you were 12.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: lt was a woman. She swung an axe at me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: You've been north of the Wall.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: What brought you up there?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Work.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And you once loved a woman many years ago, but it turned out badly so you've never let yourself love again. Oh, wait, that's me. Your turn, my mysterious foreign beauty.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: l don't want to play.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: lt's fun! Look at the fun we're having. Your mother was a whore.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Drink.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: All right. Your father left the family when you were very young, never to return.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And we've established the rules about lying?

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Drink!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: You wanted a different life. You came from somewhere and you wanted to be elsewhere.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: The whole shit-stained world could drink off that one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: So, specifics… You wanted to be elsewhere, but how would you get there? l don't believe the life of the Silent Sisters is for you. So, what's a lowborn girl to do?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Are you sure –

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Drink! And don't talk about my mother and father ever, or l will carve your eyes from your head.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My dear lady, if l have offended you, l apologize.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: My turn.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Fine, fine. Ask away. Try to penetrate the enigma that is me.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Who were you in love with?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: That's not how the game works.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: l don't care the way the game works.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Our lord here used to be married.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Married?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: How did you hear that?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: You hear lots of things playing dice with Lannister soldiers.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Another night, perhaps.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Not another night. This night.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: lt's not a pleasant story.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Oh, maybe l will cry.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: l'm guessing the lady and l can tell more unpleasant stories than your lordship.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: So l was 16. My brother Jaime and l were riding, when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off, with two men on her heels. Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while l wrapped her in my cloak. She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers l took her to the nearest inn and fed her. Her name was Tysha. She was a wheelwright's orphan. And she was hungry. Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine. lmpossible as it seems, there was a time when l was unaccustomed to wine. l forgot how afraid l was around girls. how l was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed, or ask me about my tall, handsome brother. l forgot about everything but Tysha. And somehow l found myself in her bed.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: For three chickens, l should hope so.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: lt didn't last long. l didn't know what the hell l was doing. But she was good to me. She kissed me afterwards and sang me a song. And by morning l was deep enough in love to ask for her hand. A few lies, a few gold coins, one drunken septon and there you have it - man and wife. For a fortnight anyway, until the septon sobered up and told my father.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Well, l imagine that was the end of all that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Not quite. First, my father had Jaime tell me the truth. The girl was a whore, you see. Jaime had arranged the whole thing - the road, the rapers, all of it. He thought it was time l had a woman. After my brother confessed, my father brought in my wife and gave her to his guards. He paid her well - a silver for each man. How many whores command that kind of price? He brought me into the barracks and made me watch. By the end, she had so much silver that the coins were slipping through her fingers and rolling on to the floor.

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: l would have killed the man who did that to me.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: You should have known she was a whore.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Really? l was 16, drunk and in love.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: A girl who was almost raped doesn't invite another man into her bed two hours later.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: As l said, l was young and stupid.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: You are still young and stupid.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What is it? What do you want?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: You're sleeping through the war.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: They stole a night's march on us. They're a mile north.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Get my squire!

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: You don't have a squire.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: lf l die, weep for me.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: You'll be dead. How will you know?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: l'll know.

Name: lannister soldier
Speaker: Lannister Soldier
Interaction: Watch out! Move!

Name: lannister soldier
Speaker: Lannister Soldier
Interaction: Out of the way! Move aside!

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Stay low.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Stay low?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: lf you're lucky, no one will notice you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: l was born lucky. Tribesmen of the Vale, gather round! Stone Crows! Black Ears! Burned Men! Moon Brothers! And Painted Dogs! Your dominion over the Vale begins now! Onward, to claim what is yours!

Name: tribesmen of vale
Speaker: Tribesmen Of Vale
Interaction: Half man! Half man! Half man! Half man! Half man! Half man!

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: To battle!

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: You're a shit warrior.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: l'm alive?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: You're alive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Did we win?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: We wouldn't be having this conversation if we didn't.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: How did our tribesmen do?

Name: bronn
Speaker: Bronn
Interaction: Yeah, good.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: lt's nice to see them getting along.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: You're wounded.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Good of you to notice. l hear we won.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Huh! The scouts were wrong. There were 2,000 Stark bannermen, not 20 [thousand].

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Did we get the Stark boy, at least?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: He wasn't here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Where was he?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: With his other 18,000 men.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And where are they?

Name: rodrik cassel
Speaker: Rodrik Cassel
Interaction: We should go, my lady.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: No!

Name: rodrik cassel
Speaker: Rodrik Cassel
Interaction: My lady!

Name: stark bannermen
Speaker: Stark Bannermen
Interaction: Hyah! Hyah!

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: By the time they knew what was happening, it had already happened.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Lady Stark. l'd offer you my sword, but l seem to have lost it.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: lt is not your sword l want. Give me my daughters back. Give me my husband.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: l've lost them too, l'm afraid.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Kill him, Robb. Send his head to his father. He cut down ten of our men. You saw him.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: He's more use to us alive than dead.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Take him away and put him in irons.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: We could end this war right now, boy, save thousands of lives. You fight for the Starks, l fight for the Lannisters. Swords or lances, teeth, nails - choose your weapons and let's end this here and now.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: lf we do it your way, Kingslayer, you'd win. We're not doing it your way.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: Come on, pretty man.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: l sent 2,000 men to their graves today.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: The bards will sing songs of their sacrifice.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Aye. But the dead won't hear them. One victory does not make us conquerors. Did we free my father? Did we rescue my sisters from the queen? Did we free the North from those who want us on our knees? This war is far from over.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Could l have one? A lemon one or any of them.

Name: kings landing baker
Speaker: Kings Landing Baker
Interaction: Three coppers.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: How about a nice fat pigeon?

Name: kings landing baker
Speaker: Kings Landing Baker
Interaction: Oh, piss off now. Go on.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Do you have any stale ones from yesterday? Or any burnt ones?

Name: kings landing baker
Speaker: Kings Landing Baker
Interaction: Piss off!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Hey, where's everyone going? What's happening?

Name: street urchin
Speaker: Street Urchin
Interaction: They're taking him to the Sept of Baelor.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Who?

Name: street urchin
Speaker: Street Urchin
Interaction: The Hand of the King.

Name: populace
Speaker: Populace
Interaction: Traitor! Coward!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: Baelor!

Name: populace
Speaker: Populace
Interaction: Traitor! Traitor!

Name: eddard stark
Speaker: Eddard Stark
Interaction: I am Eddard Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Hand of the King. I come before you to confess my treason in the sight of Gods and men. I betrayed the faith of my King and the trust of my friend Robert. I swore to protect and defend his children, but before his blood was cold I plotted to murder his son and seize the Throne for myself. Let the High Septon and Baelor the Blessed bear witness to what I say

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: As we sin, so do we suffer. This man has confessed his crimes in sight of Gods and men. The Gods are just but beloved Baelor taught us they can also be merciful. What is to be done with this traitor, Your Grace?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: My mother wishes me to let Lord Eddard join The Night's Watch. Stripped of all titles and powers, he would serve the realm in permanent exile. And My Lady Sansa has begged mercy for her father. But they have the soft hearts of women. So long as I am your King, treason shall never go unpunished. Ser Ilyn, bring me his head!

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No, stop! Please, someone stop him!

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: My son, this is madness.

Name: populace
Speaker: Populace
Interaction: Put him down!

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Don't look!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Let me go.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Shut your mouth. Look at me.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Stop him, stop!

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Look at me. Look at me! Do you remember me now, boy, eh? Remember me? There's a bright boy. You'll be coming with me, boy, and you'll be keeping your mouth shut.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Keep your mouth shut, boy.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: l'm not a boy!

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: You're not a smart boy, is that what you're trying to say? Do you want to live, boy?! North, boy, we're going north.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: lt had three eyes. lt told me to come with him, so l did. We went down into the crypts and my father was there.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: Your father's not down there, little lord. Not for many years yet.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: You're afraid. Just like Hodor.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: l'm not afraid of some hole in the ground.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: You've lived beyond the Wall. What are you scared of? l'm a crippled boy and l'm willing to go.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: That's my grandfather, Lord Rickard. He was burned alive by the Mad King, Aerys. That's Lyanna, my father's sister. King Robert was supposed to marry her, but Rhaegar Targaryen kidnapped her. Robert started a war to win her back. He killed Rhaegar, but she died anyway. That's where l saw Father.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: You see? He's not here.

Name: rickon stark
Speaker: Rickon Stark
Interaction: Here, Shaggydog.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Rickon!

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: That beast is supposed to be chained in the kennels!

Name: rickon stark
Speaker: Rickon Stark
Interaction: He doesn't like chains.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: What are you doing down here? Come back up with us.

Name: rickon stark
Speaker: Rickon Stark
Interaction: No, l came to see Father.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: How many times have l told you? He's in King's Landing with Sansa and Arya.

Name: rickon stark
Speaker: Rickon Stark
Interaction: He was down here. l saw him.

Name: bran stark
Speaker: Bran Stark
Interaction: Saw him when?

Name: rickon stark
Speaker: Rickon Stark
Interaction: Last night, when l was sleeping. Here, Shaggydog.

Name: osha
Speaker: Osha
Interaction: You both miss him. lt's only natural he should be in your thoughts and dreams, but that doesn't mean that –

Name: maester luwin
Speaker: Maester Luwin
Interaction: Bran…

Name: stark bannermen
Speaker: Stark Bannermen
Interaction: My lady. My lady. My lady.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Robb. Robb! You've ruined your sword.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Shh! Shh! Shh!

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: l'll kill them all. Every one of them. l will kill them all.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: My boy. They have your sisters. We have to get the girls back. And then we will kill them all.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Very amusing. lsn't it a funny song? Thank you for your rendition. l imagine it was even better received at that tavern.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: l'm so sorry, Your Grace. l'll never sing it again, l swear.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Tell me, which do you favor - your fingers or your tongue?

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Your Grace?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Fingers or your tongue? lf you got to keep one, which would it be? Or l could just cut your throat.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Every man needs hands, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Good. Tongue it is.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Your Grace, please. l won't sing, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Ser llyn, who better than you to carry out the sentence?

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: l beg you! Please, no. No!

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Your Grace, please. l beg you, l will never sing again! No!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: l'm done for the day. l'll leave the rest of the matters to you, Mother.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Your Grace, please!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: You look quite nice.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Thank you, my lord.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Your Grace. l'm King now.

Name: marillion
Speaker: Marillion
Interaction: Stop! No!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Walk with me. l want to show you something.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: Do as you're bid, child.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: And as soon as you've had your blood, l'll put a son in you. Mother says that shouldn't be long.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: No! Please, no!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: This one's your father. This one here. Look at it and see what happens to traitors.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: You promised to be merciful.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: l was. l gave him a clean death. Look at him.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Please let me go home. l won't do any treason, l swear –

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Mother says l'm still to marry you. So you'll stay here, and obey. Look at him!

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Well?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: How long do l have to look?

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: As long as it pleases me. Do you want to see the rest?

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: lf it please Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: That's your Septa there. l'll tell you what, l'm going to give you a present. After l raise my armies and kill your traitor brother, l'm going to give you his head as well.

Name: sansa stark
Speaker: Sansa Stark
Interaction: Or maybe he'll give me yours.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: Here, girl.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: Will you obey now? Or do you need another lesson? l'll look for you in court.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: Save yourself some pain, girl. Give him what he wants.

Name: sandor clegane
Speaker: Sandor Clegane
Interaction: You'll be needing that again.

Name: jonos bracken
Speaker: Jonos Bracken
Interaction: The proper course is clear - pledge fealty to King Renly and move south to join our forces with his.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Renly is not the king.

Name: jonos bracken
Speaker: Jonos Bracken
Interaction: You cannot mean to hold to Joffrey, my lord. He put your father to death.

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: That doesn't make Renly king. He's Robert's youngest brother. lf Bran can't be Lord of Winterfell before me, Renly can't be king before Stannis.

Name: jonos bracken
Speaker: Jonos Bracken
Interaction: Do you mean to declare us for Stannis?

Name: galbart glover
Speaker: Galbart Glover
Interaction: Renly is not right! lf we put ourselves behind Stannis…

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: My Lords. My Lords! Here is what l say to these two kings. Renly Baratheon is nothing to me, nor Stannis neither. Why should they rule over me and mine from some flowery seat in the South? What do they know of the Wall or the Wolfswood? Even their gods are wrong! Why shouldn't we rule ourselves again? lt was the dragons we bowed to and now the dragons are dead! There sits the only king l mean to bend my knee to - the King in the North!

Name: rickard karstark
Speaker: Rickard Karstark
Interaction: l'll have peace on those terms. They can keep their Red Castle and their iron chair too. The King in the North!

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: Am l your brother, now and always?

Name: robb stark
Speaker: Robb Stark
Interaction: Now and always.

Name: theon greyjoy
Speaker: Theon Greyjoy
Interaction: My sword is yours in victory and defeat, from this day until my last day.

Name: greatjon umber
Speaker: Greatjon Umber
Interaction: The King in the North!

Name: all
Speaker: All
Interaction: The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

Name: stark guard
Speaker: Stark Guard
Interaction: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: l want to see him. Now! Leave us.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Leave us.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: You look lovely tonight, Lady Stark. Widowhood becomes you. Your bed must be lonely. ls that why you came? l'm not at my best, but l think l could be of service. You slip out of that gown and we'll see if l'm up to it. Oh, l do like a violent woman.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: l will kill you tonight, Ser. Pack your head in a box and send it to your sister.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: Let me show you how. Hit me again, over the ear. And again and again. You're stronger than you look, it shouldn't take long.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: That is what you want the world to believe, isn't it? That you don't fear death.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: But l don't, my lady. The dark is coming for all of us. Why cry about it?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Because you are going to the deepest of the seven hells, if the gods are just.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: What gods are those? The trees your husband prayed to? Where were the trees when his head was getting chopped off? lf your gods are real and if they are just why is the world so full of injustice?

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Because of men like you.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: There are no men like me. Only me.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: My son Bran. How did he come to fall from that tower?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: l pushed him out the window.

Name: catelyn stark
Speaker: Catelyn Stark
Interaction: Why?

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: I hoped the fall would kill him.

Name: jaime lannister
Speaker: Jaime Lannister
Interaction: You should get some sleep. lt's going to be a long war.

Name: lancel lannister
Speaker: Lancel Lannister
Interaction: l can't believe we're actually at war. Was it this exciting last time, when you were young? What does it say? Have we captured Robb Stark yet? What's our next move?

Name: cersei lannister
Speaker: Cersei Lannister
Interaction: Stop talking. Get back into bed.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: They have my son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: The Stark boy appears to be less green than we'd hoped.

Name: leo lefford
Speaker: Leo Lefford
Interaction: l've heard his wolf killed a dozen men and as many horses.

Name: addam marbrand
Speaker: Addam Marbrand
Interaction: ls it true about Stannis and Renly?

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: Both Baratheon brothers have taken up against us. Jaime captured, his armies scattered. lt's a catastrophe. Perhaps we should sue for peace.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: There's your peace. Joffrey saw to that when he decided to remove Ned Stark's head. You'll have an easier time drinking from that cup than you will bringing Robb Stark to the table now. He's winning – in case you hadn't noticed.

Name: kevan lannister
Speaker: Kevan Lannister
Interaction: l'm told we still have his sisters.

Name: leo lefford
Speaker: Leo Lefford
Interaction: The first order of business is ransoming Ser Jaime.

Name: addam marbrand
Speaker: Addam Marbrand
Interaction: Kevan Lannister

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: They have my son! Get out, all of you. Not you. You were right about Eddard Stark. lf he were alive, we could have used him to broker a peace with Winterfell and Riverrun, which would have given us more time to deal with Robert's brothers. But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Half wrong. l'm new to strategy, but unless we want to be surrounded by three armies, it appears we can't stay here.

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: No one will stay here. Ser Gregor will head out with 500 riders and set the Riverland on fire from Godo s Eye to the Red Fork. The rest of us will regroup at Harrenhal. And you will go to King's Landing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: And do what?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: Rule. You will serve as Hand of the King in my stead. You will bring that boy king to heel, and his mother too, if needs be. And if you get so much as a whiff of treason from any of the rest – Baelish, Varys, Pycelle…

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: Heads, spikes, walls. Why not my uncle? Why not anyone? Why me?

Name: tywin lannister
Speaker: Tywin Lannister
Interaction: You're my son. Oh, one more thing. You will not take that whore to court. Do you understand?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Ser Jorah?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Gently, gently.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: My son – where is he? l want him. Where is he?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: The boy did not live.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Tell me.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: What is there to tell?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: How did my son die?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: He never lived, my princess. The women say –

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: What do the women say?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: They say the child was –

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: Monstrous, twisted. l pulled him out myself. He was scaled like a lizard, blind, with leather wings like the wings of a bat. When l touched him the skin fell from his bones. Inside he was full of graveworms. l warned you that only death can pay for life. You knew the price.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Where is Khal Drogo? Show him to me. Show me what l bought with my son's life.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: As you command, lady. Come. l will take you to him.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Time enough for that later –

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l want to see him now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: The khalasar is gone.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: A khal who cannot ride is no khal. The Dothraki follow only the strong. l'm sorry, my Princess.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Drogo! My sun and stars. Why is he out here alone?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: He seems to like the warmth, Princess.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: He lives. You asked for life, you paid for life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: This is not life. When will he be as he was?

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: When the sun rises in the west, sets in the east. When the seas go dry. When the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Leave us.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: l don't want you alone with this sorceress.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l have nothing more to fear from this woman. Go.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: You knew what l was buying and you knew the price.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: lt was wrong of them to burn my temple. lt angered the Great Shepherd.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: This is not Godo s work. My child was innocent.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: lnnocent? He would have been The Stallion Who Mounts The World. Now he will burn no cities. Now his khalasar will trample no nations into dust.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l spoke for you. l saved you.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: Saved me? Three of those riders had already raped me before you saved me, girl. l saw my godo s house burn, there where l had healed men and women beyond counting. ln the streets l saw piles of heads, the head of the baker who makes my bread, the head of a young boy that l had cured of fever just three moons past. So tell me again exactly what it was that you saved?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Your life.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: Why don't you take a look at your khal. Then you will see exactly what life is worth when all the rest has gone.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: You can't!

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Get out of my way, Sam.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: They'll put out the word. They'll send out ravens. People will come after you. Do you know what happens to deserters?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Better than you do.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: What are you going to do?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: l'm gonna find my brother and put a sword through King Joffrey's throat.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: You can't leave us now. We need you here.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Move.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: l won't let you go.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: No.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Hyah!

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Hand of the King?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: So it would seem.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: And your father said you couldn't take anyone with you to King's Landing?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: No, he said l couldn't take with me to King's Landing. He was very specific on that point.

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: He knew my name?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: What?

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: He said, "Don't bring Shae with you to King's Landing"?

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: l believe he used the word "whore".

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: Are you ashamed of me? Are you afraid that l'm dancing around the court with my tits out?

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: I'm funny now? l'm Shae, the funny whore.

Name: tyrion lannister
Speaker: Tyrion Lannister
Interaction: My father's probably the most powerful man in the country. Certainly the richest. He has all Seven Kingdoms in his pockets. Everyone everywhere always has to do exactly what my father says. He's always been a cunt. l believe the ladies of the court could learn a great deal from a girl like you. Why don't you come with me, be the Hando s lady? Because the King needs a Hand and the Hand –

Name: shae
Speaker: Shae
Interaction: l know what a Hand needs.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Ghost?

Name: sam pyp and grenn
Speaker: Sam Pyp And Grenn
Interaction: Hyah! Hyah! Hyah! Hyah!

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Samwell!

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: ls he dead?

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: No, he's not dead.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Did we get him?

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: Come on, help me get him up.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Lucky you've got plenty of padding. We're taking you back to where you belong.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: l belong with my brother.

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: But we're your brothers now.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: They'll kill you if they find out you've gone.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: They'll kill you if they know you came after me. Go back.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Sam told us everything. We're sorry about your father.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: But it doesn't matter. You took the oath. You can't leave.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: l have to.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: You can't. You said the words.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: I don't care about –

Name: sam tarly
Speaker: Sam Tarly
Interaction: Hear my words and bear witness to my vow

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: To hell with all of you.

Name: pyp
Speaker: Pyp
Interaction: Night gathers and now my watch begins. lt shall not end until my death. l shall live and die at my post.

Name: grenn
Speaker: Grenn
Interaction: l am the sword in the darkness –

Name: sam pyp and grenn
Speaker: Sam Pyp And Grenn
Interaction: l am the sword in the darkness, the watcher on the walls, the shield that guards the realms of men. l pledge my life and honor to the Night's Watch, for this night and all nights to come.”

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Do you remember our first ride, my sun and stars? lf you are in there, if you haven't gone away, show me. You're a fighter. You've always been a fighter. l need you to fight now. l know you're very far away, but come back to me, my sun and stars.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: When the sun rises in the west and sets in the east. Then you shall return to me, my sun and stars.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Kings? Oh, l can tell you all there is to know about kings. The thing you need to understand about kings is – For the past 67 years, l've known truly known more kings than any man alive. They're complicated men, but l know how to serve them. Yes, and keep on serving them. Aerys Targaryen. Of all the thousand thousand maladies the Gods visit on us, madness is the worst. He was a good man. Such a charmer. To watch him melt away before my eyes, consumed by dreams of fire and blood. Robert Baratheon was an entirely different animal – powerful man, great warrior, but alas - winning a kingdom and ruling a kingdom are rather different things. They say that if a man goes through life with his battle visor down, he can often be blind to the enemies at his side. Now l serve his son King Joffrey, may the Gods bless his reign.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: He is a capable young man. Strong military mind. Stern. But sternness in defense of the realm is no vice. lt's far too soon to know what manner of king he will be, but l sense true greatness on the horizon for our new King. Mmm. True greatness.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: So what's the thing?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: What thing?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: About kings. You said, "The thing you need to understand about kings".

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: What? Things? What?

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: When you started, you… Never mind.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Let me see you out, my dear.

Name: ros
Speaker: Ros
Interaction: lt's all right. No need.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Speaker: Grand Maester Pycelle
Interaction: Yes, yes. Till the next time. Right.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: lt's hard for them to simper and bow without heads.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Oh, you can do better than that.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones? l've always wondered.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: l picture a gash. Like a woman's. ls that about right?

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Must be strange for you, even after all these years… a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: But you carry on whispering in one king's ear and then the next. l admire you.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: A useful talent, l'm sure you'd agree.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Playing our roles.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: Serving a new King.

Name: petyr baelish
Speaker: Petyr Baelish
Interaction: Long may he reign. My king.

Name: varys
Speaker: Varys
Interaction: My king.

Name: joffrey lannister
Speaker: Joffrey Lannister
Interaction: My lords. Shall we begin?

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: You're Arry now, hear me? Arry the orphan boy. No one asks an orphan too many questions, ‘cause nobody gives three shits. What's your name?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Arry.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: You've a long way to travel, and in bad company. l've 20 this time – men and boys all bound for the Wall. Your lord father gave me the pick of the dungeons, and l didn't find no little lordlings down there. This lot – half of them would turn you over to the King quick as spit for a pardon. And the other half would do the same, except they'd rape you first. So keep to yourself – and when you piss, do it in the woods alone. You stay with this lot, boy. And stay or l'll lock you in the back of the wagon with these three.

Name: hot pie
Speaker: Hot Pie
Interaction: Watch yourself, midget.

Name: lommy greenhands
Speaker: Lommy Greenhands
Interaction: He's got a sword, this one.

Name: hot pie
Speaker: Hot Pie
Interaction: What's a gutter rat like you doing with a sword?

Name: lommy greenhands
Speaker: Lommy Greenhands
Interaction: Maybe he's a little squire.

Name: hot pie
Speaker: Hot Pie
Interaction: He ain't no squire. Look at him. He looks like a girl. l bet he stole that sword.

Name: lommy greenhands
Speaker: Lommy Greenhands
Interaction: Let's have a look.

Name: hot pie
Speaker: Hot Pie
Interaction: l could use me a sword like that.

Name: lommy greenhands
Speaker: Lommy Greenhands
Interaction: Take it off him.

Name: hot pie
Speaker: Hot Pie
Interaction: Give it here, midget.

Name: lommy greenhands
Speaker: Lommy Greenhands
Interaction: Look at him! You'd better give Hot Pie the sword. l've seen him kick a boy to death.

Name: hot pie
Speaker: Hot Pie
Interaction: l knocked him down and l kicked him in the balls and l kept kicking him until he was dead. l kicked him all to pieces. You better give me that sword!

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: You want it? l'll give it to you. l already killed one fat boy. l bet you never killed anyone. l bet you're a liar. But l'm not. l'm good at killing fat boys. l like killing fat boys.

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: Your like picking on the little ones, do you? l've been hammering an anvil these past 10 years. When l hit that steel, it sings. Are you gonna sing when l hit you? This is castle-forged steel. Where'd you steal it?

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: lt was a gift.

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: lt don't matter now. Where we're going, they don't care what you've done. They've got rapers, pickpockets, highwaymen, murderers.

Name: arya stark
Speaker: Arya Stark
Interaction: Which are you?

Name: gendry baratheon
Speaker: Gendry Baratheon
Interaction: Armourer's apprentice. But my master got sick of me, so here l am.

Name: yoren
Speaker: Yoren
Interaction: Come on, you sorry sons of whores! lt's a thousand leagues from here to the Wall, and winter is coming!

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Ham. How many days in a row must a man be expected to start his day with ham? Bring me some beer at least. You look exhausted. Was your moonlight ride that tiring?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: My friends brought me back.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: l didn't say it was your honor.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: They killed my father.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: And you're gonna bring him back to life, are you? No? Good. We've had enough of that sort of thing. Beyond the Wall, the Rangers are reporting whole villages abandoned. At night they see fires blazing in the mountains from dusk until dawn. A captured wildling swears their tribes are uniting in some secret stronghold, to what ends the gods only know. Outside Eastwatch Cotter Pyke's men discovered four blue-eyed corpses. Unlike us, they were wise enough to burn them. Do you think your brother's war is more important than ours?

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: No.

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: When dead men and worse come hunting for us in the night, do you think it matters who sits on the lron Throne?

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: Good. Because l want you and your wolf with us when we ride out beyond the Wall tomorrow.

Name: jon snow
Speaker: Jon Snow
Interaction: Beyond the Wall?

Name: jeor mormont
Speaker: Jeor Mormont
Interaction: l'll not sit meekly by and wait for the snows. l mean to find out what's happening. The Night's Watch will ride in force against the wildlings, the White Walkers and whatever else is out there. And we will find Benjen Stark, alive or dead. l will command them myself. So l'll only ask you once, Lord Snow, are you a brother of the Night's Watch or a bastard boy who wants to play at war?

Name: rakharo
Speaker: Rakharo
Interaction: ls this your command, Khaleesi?

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Drogo will have no use for dragon eggs in the Night Lands. Sell them. You can return to the Free Cities and live as a wealthy woman for all your days.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: They were not given to me to sell.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Khaleesi, my Queen, l vow to serve you, obey you, to die for you if need be, but let him go, Khaleesi. l know what you intend. Do not.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: l must. You don't understand.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Don't ask me to stand aside as you climb on that pyre. l won't watch you burn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: ls that what you fear? You will be my khalasar. l see the faces of slaves. l free you. Take off your collars. Go if you wish, no one will stop you. But if you stay it will be as brothers and sisters, as husbands and wives.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: Ser Jorah, bind this woman to the pyre. You swore to obey me.

Name: mirri maz duur
Speaker: Mirri Maz Duur
Interaction: You will not hear me scream.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Speaker: Daenerys Targaryen
Interaction: I will. But it is not your screams I want. Only your life.

Name: jorah mormont
Speaker: Jorah Mormont
Interaction: Blood of my blood.
